abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Discord Strike
abilities.description: After a 0.5 second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take 175 (+4% per level) damage and are silenced for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Vector Targeting. Create a force, pushing Alarak and all enemies hit from the targeted point towards the targeted direction. Deals 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Lightning Surge
abilities.description: Deal 62 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and an additional 100% damage to enemies between Alarak and the target. Restore 70 (+4% per level) health for each Hero hit.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Counter-Strike
abilities.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Deadly Charge
abilities.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.625 seconds. Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Sadism
abilities.description: Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes.  Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

talents.name: AlarakRuthlessMomentum
talents.title: Ruthless Momentum
talents.description: Basic Abilities recharge 20% faster while above 80% Health.

talents.name: AlarakChaosReigns
talents.title: Chaos Reigns
talents.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 50.  Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 50.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 80 and instantly gain all other Rewards.

talents.name: AlarakAppliedForce
talents.title: Applied Force
talents.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.

talents.name: AlarakHeroicAbilityDeadlyCharge
talents.title: Deadly Charge
talents.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.625 seconds. Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

talents.name: AlarakRiteofRakShir
talents.title: Rite of Rak'Shir
talents.description: Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds.  Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds.  Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.

talents.name: AlarakMockingStrikes
talents.title: Mocking Strikes
talents.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: AlarakCounterStrikeItem
talents.title: Counter-Strike
talents.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.  This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.

talents.name: AlarakExtendedLightning
talents.title: Extended Lightning
talents.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%.  Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge.  Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

talents.name: AlarakNegativelyCharged
talents.title: Negatively Charged
talents.description: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 150%.  Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 5%.

talents.name: AlarakSustainingPower
talents.title: Sustaining Power
talents.description: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by 40%.

talents.name: AlarakDissonance
talents.title: Dissonance
talents.description: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

talents.name: AlarakPureMalice

talents.description: Increase Sadism by 10% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.

talents.name: AlarakHeroicAbilityCounterStrike
talents.title: Counter-Strike
talents.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.

talents.name: AlarakHinderedMotion

talents.name: AlarakBladeoftheHighlord

talents.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 7% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 35%. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

talents.name: AlarakLethalOnslaughtDiscordStrike

talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

talents.name: AlarakDeadlyChargeItem
talents.title: Deadly Charge
talents.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.625 seconds. Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.  This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.

talents.name: AlarakLastLaugh
talents.title: Last Laugh
talents.description: Activate teleport to the chosen location and remove all Roots, Slows, and damage over time effects. If Alarak fails to hit enemy Heroes 3 times with Basic Abilities within 4 seconds of using Last Laugh, his Health is reduced to 1.

talents.name: AlarakShowofForce

talents.description: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 77 (+4% per level) damage.

talents.name: AlarakLightningBarrage
talents.title: Lightning Barrage
talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.

talents.name: AlarakHastyBargain
talents.title: Hasty Bargain
talents.description: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism by 4% and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Impale
abilities.description: Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage. Stuns for 1 second.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Harden Carapace
abilities.description: Gain a Shield that absorbs 315 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Burrow Charge
abilities.description: Burrows to location, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Burrow Charge can be reactivated to surface early.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Locust Swarm
abilities.description: Deal 62 (+4% per level) damage per second in an area around yourself. Each enemy damaged heals you for 21 (+4% per level) Health. Lasts 6 seconds.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Cocoon
abilities.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Scarab Host

talents.name: GenericTalentRegenerationMaster

talents.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30.  Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

talents.name: GenericTalentBurningRage
talents.title: Burning Rage
talents.description: Deal 23 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

talents.name: GenericTalentRewind
talents.title: Rewind
talents.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

talents.name: AnubarakMasteryUnderkingBurrowCharge

talents.name: AnubarakHeroicAbilityCocoon
talents.title: Cocoon
talents.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

talents.name: AnubarakMasteryShedExoskeletonHardenCarapace

talents.name: AnubarakScarabHostBeetleJuiced

talents.name: AnubarakAcidDrenchedMandibles

talents.name: AnubarakCocoonCryptweave

talents.name: TalentNullificationShield

talents.name: AnubarakHeroicAbilityCarrionSwarm
talents.title: Locust Swarm

abilities.name: Q1

abilities.name: D1

talents.name: ArtanisHeroicAbilitySpearofAdunPurifierBeam

While they remain near you, damage they deal causes you to gain energy. You can only have Bestow Hope on 1 ally at a time.  You can store up to 505 (+4% per level) energy.

talents.name: AurielRepeatedOffenseDetainmentStrikeTalent
talents.title: Repeated Offense
talents.description: Quest: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by 10, up to 60. Reward: After stunning 6 Heroes, increase this damage bonus to 250.

talents.name: AurielBlindingFlashSacredSweepTalent
talents.title: Blinding Flash
talents.description: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for 2.25 seconds.

talents.name: AurielWrathofHeavenBestowHopeTalent
talents.title: Wrath of Heaven
talents.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Ability Power.

talents.name: AurielEmpathicLinkBestowHopeTalent
talents.title: Empathic Link
talents.description: Auriel stores 25% of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope.

talents.name: AurielSearingLightRayOfHeavenTalent
talents.title: Searing Light
talents.description: Ray of Heaven also deals damage to enemies in the area equal to 30% of the energy consumed.

talents.name: AurielSwiftSweepSacredSweepTalent
talents.title: Swift Sweep
talents.description: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%.

talents.name: AurielHeroicResurrect
talents.title: Resurrect
talents.description: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 0.5 seconds. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 50% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.

talents.name: AurielReservoirofHopeRayOfHeavenTalent
talents.title: Reservoir of Hope
talents.description: Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75.

talents.name: AurielShieldOfHopeTalent
talents.title: Shield of Hope
talents.description: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for 3 seconds equal to 50% of the amount of Health they are missing.

talents.name: AurielRepellingStrikeDetainmentStrikeTalent
talents.title: Repelling Strike
talents.description: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 35% farther.

talents.name: AurielPiercingLashDetainmentStrikeTalent
talents.title: Piercing Lash
talents.description: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemy Heroes in a line, reducing the cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

talents.name: AurielLightSpeedResurrectTalent
talents.title: Light Speed
talents.description: Resurrected allies gain 200% increased Movement Speed, decaying over 4 seconds. While a resurrected ally remains alive, Resurrect's next cooldown recharges 100% faster.

talents.name: AurielHeavyBurdenDetainmentStrikeTalent
talents.title: Heavy Burden
talents.description: When an enemy Hero is stunned by Detainment Strike, their Movement Speed is slowed by 40% for 3 seconds after the stun.

talents.name: AurielGlimmerofHopeRayOfHeavenTalent
talents.title: Glimmer of Hope
talents.description: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of Auriel's next Ray of Heaven by 75%.

talents.name: AurielAngelicFlightTalent
talents.title: Angelic Flight
talents.description: Activate to fly to a chosen location.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Globe Of Annihilation
abilities.description: Shoot a globe of destruction, dealing 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact. Long range.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Summon Demon Warrior
abilities.description: Spawn a Demon Warrior that marches toward a point. Warriors deal 37 (+4% per level) damage per second and last for 10.5 seconds.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: All Shall Burn
abilities.description: Channel a death beam on an enemy dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage a second. The damage amount grows the longer it is channeled, to a maximum of 200 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Does 25% more damage to Structures. Azmodan can move at 40% speed while channeling.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Black Pool
abilities.description: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their Basic Attack and Ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Demonic Invasion
abilities.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 104 (+4% per level) damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 51 (+4% per level) damage and have 365 (+4% per level) health.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: General of Hell
abilities.description: Summon a Demon Lieutenant at an allied Mercenary, Minion, or Azmodan's Summons. The Lieutenant will march with the target, granting 15% increased damage and 15% increased maximum Health to all nearby friendly Mercenaries, Minions, and Azmodan's Summons. Unlimited range.

talents.name: AzmodanMasterySiegingWrath
talents.title: Sieging Wrath
talents.description: Quest: Every time Globe of Annihilation hits a Hero, its damage is increased by 4, up to 100. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the range of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 33% and its damage is increased by an additional 100.

talents.name: AzmodanMasteryArmyOfHell
talents.title: Army of Hell
talents.description: Increases Demon Warrior's damage by 20% and reduces their Mana cost by 20.

talents.name: AzmodanMasteryInfernalGlobe
talents.title: Infernal Globe
talents.description: Globe of Annihilation's cast time is decreased by 40% and its missile speed is increased by 40%.

talents.name: AzmodanHeroicAbilityBlackPool
talents.title: Black Pool
talents.description: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their Basic Attack and Ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: AzmodanMasteryHedonism
talents.title: Hedonism
talents.description: Reduces Globe of Annihilation's Mana cost by 30.

talents.name: AzmodanMasteryBattleborn
talents.title: Battleborn
talents.description: If Globe of Annihilation hits an enemy, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the impact point.

talents.name: AzmodanMasteryForcedRecruitment
talents.title: Forced Recruitment
talents.description: Reduces General of Hell's cooldown by 10 seconds and gains an additional charge.

talents.name: AzmodanMasteryHellforgedArmor
talents.title: Hellforged Armor
talents.description: Demon Warriors deal 10 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every second and are granted 50 Armor against non-Heroic sources, decreasing the damage they take 50%.

talents.name: AzmodanMasteryMasterOfDestruction
talents.title: Master of Destruction
talents.description: Reduces the Mana cost from 16 to 10 per second. Every 1.5 seconds spent channeling increases the range by 10%, to a maximum of 30%.

talents.name: AzmodanMasteryGluttony
talents.title: Gluttony
talents.description: All Shall Burn heals Azmodan for 25% of the damage dealt.

talents.name: AzmodanMasteryMarchOfSin
talents.title: March of Sin
talents.description: Increases Azmodan's Movement Speed while channeling All Shall Burn to 80% of normal speed.

talents.name: AzmodanHeroicAbilityDemonicInvasion
talents.title: Demonic Invasion
talents.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 104 (+4% per level) damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 51 (+4% per level) damage and have 365 (+4% per level) health.

talents.name: AzmodanMasteryInfusedPower
talents.title: Infused Power
talents.description: All Shall Burn's damage growth maximum is increased by 40%.

talents.name: AzmodanMasteryDemonicSmite
talents.title: Demonic Smite
talents.description: Every 7.5 seconds, the Demon Lieutenant will blast a non-Heroic unit dealing 411 (+4% per level) damage.

talents.name: AzmodanMasteryBlackPoolFifthCircle
talents.title: Fifth Circle
talents.description: Black Pool makes Basic Attacks and Abilities slow enemies Attack and Movement Speeds by 40% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: AzmodanBoltoftheStorms
talents.title: Bolt of the Storm
talents.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

talents.name: AzmodanSinforSin
talents.title: Sin for Sin
talents.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

talents.name: AzmodanMasteryTasteForBlood
talents.title: Taste for Blood
talents.description: Quest: Kill enemy Minions and Heroes within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Globe of Annihilation.  Reward: Enemy Minions that die increase its damage by 2.  Reward: Enemy Heroes that die increase its damage by 10.  Maximum bonus damage of 500.

talents.name: AzmodanMasteryPerishingFlame
talents.title: Perishing Flame
talents.description: When the Grunts die they explode, dealing 68 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

talents.name: AzmodanHellishHirelings
talents.title: Hellish Hirelings
talents.description: The damage bonus from General of Hell is doubled on Mercenaries.

talents.name: AzmodanSinsGrasp
talents.title: Sin's Grasp
talents.description: Activate to curse an enemy Hero, dealing 247.5 (+4% per level) damage over 8 seconds. Minion kills reduce this cooldown by 10 seconds. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

talents.name: AzmodanMasteryBoundMinion
talents.title: Bound Minion
talents.description: Using General of Hell on a Minion grants them 75 Armor from non-Heroic sources, decreasing the damage they take by 75%, while also  increasing the damage they deal to non-Heroic targets by 100%. Lasts 30 seconds.

talents.name: AzmodanGluttonousWard
talents.title: Gluttonous Ward
talents.description: Activate to place a ward on the ground that restores 3% of Azmodan's maximum Health and Mana every second for 10 seconds. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Arcane Flare
abilities.description: Deal 274 (+4% per level) damage in a small area and 91 (+4% per level) damage in a larger area.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Polymorph
abilities.description: Target is slowed by 25% Movement Speed, and cannot attack and is Silenced making them unable to use Abilities for 1.25 seconds.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Pixie Dust
abilities.description: Increase target's Movement Speed by 20%, and grant them 30 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Spell damage taken by 30%.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Blink Heal
abilities.description: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for 204 (+4% per level). Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Emerald Wind
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.  Passive: Increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 8%.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Soothing Mist
abilities.description: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 115 (+4% per level) every 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Z1
abilities.title: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Instead of mounting, teleport to an allied Hero.

talents.name: GenericTalentIceBlock
talents.title: Ice Block
talents.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

talents.name: BrightwingHyperShiftPhaseShift
talents.title: Hyper Shift
talents.description: Each allied Hero healed by Soothing Mist reduces the cooldown of Phase Shift by 3 seconds.

talents.name: BrightwingPeekabooPhaseShift
talents.title: Peekaboo!
talents.description: Phase Shifting to an ally casts a free Pixie Dust on them and reveals a large area around them and all enemies in it for 6 seconds.

talents.name: FaerieDragonMasteryPhaseShield
talents.title: Phase Shield
talents.description: After finishing the teleport, both Brightwing and her target gain a 400 (+4% per level) point Shield for 10 seconds.

talents.name: FaerieDragonHeroicAbilityBlinkHeal
talents.title: Blink Heal
talents.description: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for 204 (+4% per level). Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: FaerieDragonMasteryShieldDust
talents.title: Shield Dust
talents.description: Pixie Dust grants 50 Physical Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Physical damage taken by 50%.

talents.name: BrightwingBouncyDustPixieDust
talents.title: Bouncy Dust
talents.description: Pixie Dust bounces to another nearby ally upon impact.

talents.name: BrightwingManicPixiePixieDust
talents.title: Manic Pixie
talents.description: When Soothing Mist heals an ally with Pixie Dust on them, they heal for an additional 104 (+4% per level) over 4 seconds.

talents.name: BrightwingMistifiedSoothingMist
talents.title: Mistified
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 0.5 seconds every time Brightwing casts a Basic Ability.

talents.name: FaerieDragonHeroicAbilityEmeraldWind
talents.title: Emerald Wind
talents.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.  Passive: Increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 8%.

talents.name: FaerieDragonMasteryCritterize
talents.title: Critterize
talents.description: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by 25, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

talents.name: GenericTalentCleanse
talents.title: Cleanse
talents.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

talents.name: BrightwingPixieBoostPixieDust
talents.title: Pixie Boost
talents.description: Pixie Dust gives 50% bonus Move Speed, decaying to 20% over 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: FaerieDragonMasteryContinuousWinds
talents.title: Continuous Winds
talents.description: Emerald Wind releases two additional novas that deal 25% damage. Also further increases the healing bonus of Soothing Mist by 7%.

talents.name: BrightwingPixieCharm
talents.title: Pixie Charm
talents.description: Each time Brightwing heals an Allied Hero with Soothing Mist, she gains a stack of Bribe. Use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 80 stacks.

talents.name: BrightwingUnstableAnomalyPolymorph
talents.title: Unstable Anomaly
talents.description: When Polymorph ends, deal 114 (+4% per level) damage to the target and all nearby enemies.

talents.name: GenericTalentStormShield
talents.title: Storm Shield
talents.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

talents.name: BrightwingGreaterPolymorphPolymorph
talents.title: Greater Polymorph
talents.description: Increases the duration of Polymorph by 0.75 seconds.

talents.name: FaerieDragonMasteryStickyFlare
talents.title: Sticky Flare
talents.description: Enemies hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed slowed by 40% for 2 seconds.

talents.name: BrightwingRevitalizingMistSoothingMist
talents.title: Revitalizing Mist
talents.description: Healing another Hero with Soothing Mist increases their healing received from Soothing Mist by 25% for 6 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

talents.name: BrightwingDoubleWyrmholeBlinkHeal
talents.title: Double Wyrmhole
talents.description: Blink Heal can be cast a second time on a different target within 2 seconds without consuming a charge.

talents.name: BrightwingDreamShotArcaneFlare
talents.title: Dream Shot
talents.description: Increase the range of Arcane Flare by 50%. If an enemy Hero is hit by the inner radius, reduce it's cooldown to 1 second.

talents.name: FaerieDragonHardenedFocus
talents.title: Hardened Focus
talents.description: While above 80% life, your Basic Ability cooldowns regenerate 50% faster.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Lightning Fury
abilities.description: Hurl a lightning javelin that deals 175 (+4.5% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and splits into two lightning bolts that deal 175 (+4.5% per level) damage to enemies in their path.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Blinding Light
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, Blind enemies in the target area for 2 seconds. Passive: Cassia deals 20% increased damage to Blinded targets.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Fend
abilities.description: Charge at an enemy, and upon arriving channel for up to 1.5 seconds, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in front of Cassia every 0.25 seconds. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Ball Lightning
abilities.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Valkyrie
abilities.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Avoidance
abilities.description: While moving unmounted, Cassia gains 65 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing the damage taken by 65%.

talents.name: AmazonThunderstroke
talents.title: Thunderstroke
talents.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Lightning Fury. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Lightning Fury's damage by 100. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Lightning Fury gains a 2nd charge and its Mana cost is reduced from 30 to 15.

talents.name: AmazonPlateoftheWhale
talents.title: Plate of the Whale
talents.description: Regenerate 5 Health per second while Avoidance is active. Quest: For every 5 Basic Attacks absorbed with Avoidance, it regenerates an additional 1 Health per second. Reward: After absorbing 75 Basic Attacks, increase Cassia's maximum Health by 10%.

talents.name: AmazonImpale
talents.title: Impale
talents.description: Enemies below 50% Health take 50% increased damage from Fend.

talents.name: AmazonBallLightning
talents.title: Ball Lightning
talents.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.

talents.name: AmazonLungingStrike
talents.title: Lunging Strike
talents.description: Increase Fend's range and area by 20% and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

talents.name: AmazonChargedStrikes
talents.title: Charged Strikes
talents.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 20% and cause Basic Attacks to bounce to nearby enemy Heroes for 8 seconds.

talents.name: AmazonInnerLight
talents.title: Inner Light
talents.description: Whenever Cassia is Stunned or Rooted, Blinding Light is cast at her location. This effect has a 6 second cooldown. Passive: Blinding Light's radius is increased by 25%.

talents.name: AmazonPenetrate
talents.title: Penetrate
talents.description: Enemies take 3% increased damage from Fend each consecutive hit.

talents.name: AmazonRingoftheLeech
talents.title: Ring of the Leech
talents.description: Cassia heals for 25% of the damage she deals to Blinded enemies.

talents.name: AmazonInfiniteLightning
talents.title: Infinite Lightning
talents.description: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely, and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds every time an enemy Hero is hit.

talents.name: AmazonWarTraveler
talents.title: War Traveler
talents.description: Cassia gains 4% Movement Speed every 0.5 seconds while Avoidance is active, up to 15%. This bonus is reset when Cassia stops moving or uses an Ability.

talents.name: AmazonSeraphsHymn
talents.title: Seraph's Hymn
talents.description: Reduce Blinding Light's Mana cost from 70 to 40. Basic Attacks against Blinded enemies reduce the cooldown of Blinding Light by 2 seconds.

talents.name: AmazonMartialLaw
talents.title: Martial Law
talents.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

talents.name: AmazonGroundingBolt
talents.title: Grounding Bolt
talents.description: Lightning Fury Slows enemies hit by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: AmazonPierce
talents.title: Pierce
talents.description: The primary missile of Lightning Fury now pierces, but splits only when hitting Heroes.

talents.name: AmazonSurgeOfLight
talents.title: Surge of Light
talents.description: After taking 500 damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal 225 (+4% per level) damage to enemies around her.

talents.name: AmazonValkyrie
talents.title: Valkyrie
talents.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

talents.name: AmazonImprisoningLight
talents.title: Imprisoning Light
talents.description: Upon impaling a Hero, Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Roots them for 3 seconds.

talents.name: AmazonThundergodsVigor
talents.title: Thundergod's Vigor
talents.description: Enemy Heroes hit by the primary missile of Lightning Fury reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

talents.name: AmazonTitansRevenge
talents.title: Titan's Revenge
talents.description: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor, and her Basic Attack range is increased by 2.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Flying Kick
abilities.description: Kick through target enemy, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Keg Smash
abilities.description: Smash your keg, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage and drenching affected enemies in Brew, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Breath of Fire
abilities.description: Breathe a cone of flames, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies soaked in Brew are set on fire, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Wandering Keg
abilities.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Storm, Earth, Fire
abilities.description: Split into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 75% of your maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant your spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies. Fire can grant your spirits Attack Speed.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Fortifying Brew
abilities.description: Chen drinks from his keg, instantly gaining 25 Brew. While drinking, Chen continues to gain 30 Brew and 212 (+4% per level) temporary Shields per second, up to a maximum of 636 (+4% per level) while drinking. Shields persist for 2 seconds after he stops drinking.

talents.name: ChenAccumulatingFlame
talents.title: Accumulating Flame
talents.description: Quest: Every time a Hero is Ignited with Breath of Fire, increase its damage over time by 2%, up to 60%. Reward: After Igniting 30 Heroes, gain 25 Armor for 1 second per Hero Ignited, reducing damage taken by 25%.

talents.name: ChenDeadlyStrike
talents.title: Deadly Strike
talents.description: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

talents.name: ChenBolderFlavor
talents.title: Bolder Flavor
talents.description: Fortifying Brew instantly Shields Chen for 318. Additionally, Shields persist for 1 extra second after he stops drinking.

talents.name: ChenHeroicAbilityWanderingKeg
talents.title: Wandering Keg
talents.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

talents.name: ChenMasteryKegSmashATouchOfHoney
talents.title: A Touch of Honey
talents.description: Increase the slow from Keg Smash to 40%.

talents.name: ChenMasteryFortifyingBrewEnoughToShare
talents.title: Enough to Share
talents.description: Fortifying Brew also Shields nearby allied Heroes for 54 (+4% per level) per second.

talents.name: ChenFreshestIngredients
talents.title: Freshest Ingredients
talents.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Chen's Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, 50% of the Shield from Fortifying Brew persists indefinitely after drinking.

talents.name: ChenPurifyingBrew
talents.title: Purifying Brew
talents.description: The next Stun or Silence used against Chen has its duration reduced by 75% and resets the cooldown of Fortifying Brew. Can only trigger once every 15 seconds. While channeling Fortifying Brew gain 30 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 30%.

talents.name: ChenHeroicAbilityStormEarthFire
talents.title: Storm, Earth, Fire
talents.description: Split into three elemental spirits for 12.15 seconds, each with 75% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well. Storm can grant the spirits Movement Speed.  Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed.

talents.name: ChenPressurePoint
talents.title: Pressure Point
talents.description: Flying Kick slows the target enemy by 35% for 1 second, or by 70% if they're soaked in Brew.

talents.name: ChenFlyingLeap
talents.title: Flying Leap
talents.description: Increases Flying Kick's range by 15%.

talents.name: ChenRingofFire
talents.title: Ring of Fire
talents.description: After using Breath of Fire, ignite in a fiery aura, dealing 52 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

talents.name: ChenKegToss
talents.title: Keg Toss
talents.description: Quest: Every time Keg Smash hits a Hero, increase its damage by 3, up to 60.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase its range by 125% and gain an additional charge.

talents.name: ChenBrewmastersBalance
talents.title: Brewmaster's Balance
talents.description: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 (+4% per level) Health per second.

talents.name: ChenAnotherRound
talents.title: Another Round
talents.description: Increases the radius of Keg Smash by 50%. After hitting an enemy Hero with Keg Smash, the cooldown of the next Basic Ability used will be reduced by 3 seconds.

talents.name: ChenStormstoutSecretRecipe
talents.title: Stormstout Secret Recipe
talents.description: Heal for 1.5% of Chen's maximum Health every time his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.

talents.name: ChenWitheringFlames
talents.title: Withering Flames
talents.description: Setting an enemy Hero on fire reduces their Ability Power by 25% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: ChenElementalConduit
talents.title: Elemental Conduit
talents.description: Increases the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and empowers their abilities. Storm can grant the spirits Unstoppable.  Earth's leap cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.  Fire grants Attack Speed as long as it is alive.

talents.name: ChenElusiveBrawler
talents.title: Elusive Brawler
talents.description: Activate to evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

talents.name: ChenMasteryWanderingKegUntappedPotential
talents.title: Untapped Potential
talents.description: Wandering Keg increases Movement Speed by 25% and grants 50 Armor, reducing damage taken by 50%.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Surging Fist
abilities.description: Activate to begin charging Surging Fist. Activate again to dash forward, knocking aside enemies and dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage. The dash range increases by up to 250%, depending on how long it is charged.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Consuming Blaze
abilities.description: Ignite nearby enemies, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds. Basic Attacking burning enemies re-Ignites them. Cho is healed for 40 (+4% per level) when an enemy is Ignited.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Rune Bomb
abilities.description: Roll a bomb dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. Gall can use Runic Blast to detonate it to deal 221 (+4% per level) damage in an area.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Hammer of Twilight
abilities.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and stuning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Upheaval
abilities.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Ogre Hide
abilities.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, but reduce Gall's damage by 25%.

talents.name: ChoConsumingFire
talents.title: Consuming Fire
talents.description: Consuming Blaze heals for 150% more when a Hero is Ignited.

talents.name: ChoFuelForTheFlame
talents.title: Fuel for the Flame
talents.description: Quest: Every minion killed near Cho increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 0.3%.  Quest: Every Hero Takedown increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 3%.

talents.name: ChoCallousedHide
talents.title: Calloused Hide
talents.description: Ogre Hide also increases healing received by 15%.

talents.name: ChoUppercut
talents.title: Uppercut
talents.description: Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 7% of their max Health.

talents.name: ChoRollback
talents.title: Rollback
talents.description: Rune Bomb continues to travel after detonation, and will roll back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.

talents.name: ChoSearedFlesh
talents.title: Seared Flesh
talents.description: Each consecutive Basic Attack to an enemy Hero deals 20% more damage, to a maximum of 60% damage. This bonus lasts 5 seconds or until a different enemy is attacked.

talents.name: ChoPowerSurge
talents.title: Power Surge
talents.description: Each Hero hit by Surging Fist reduces its cooldown by 4 seconds.

talents.name: ChoFirestarter
talents.title: Firestarter
talents.description: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 1 second.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 3 seconds.

talents.name: ChoEnragedRegeneration
talents.title: Enraged Regeneration
talents.description: While Gall's Ogre Rage is active, Cho's health regeneration is increased by 200%.

talents.name: ChoHeroicAbilityHammerOfTwilight
talents.title: Hammer of Twilight
talents.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and stuning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

talents.name: ChoHeroicAbilityUpheaval
talents.title: Upheaval
talents.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

talents.name: ChoFrenziedFists
talents.title: Frenzied Fists
talents.description: Gain 75% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after using Surging Fist.

talents.name: ChoRunicFeedback
talents.title: Runic Feedback
talents.description: Gall's Runic Blast reduces Cho's Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 seconds per enemy hit, and 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

talents.name: ChoRunedGauntlet
talents.title: Runed Gauntlet
talents.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by 0.75 seconds.

talents.name: ChoSurgingDash
talents.title: Surging Dash
talents.description: While channeling Surging Fist, Cho is Unstoppable and heals for 150 (+4% per level) Health per second.

talents.name: ChoTwilightVeil
talents.title: Twilight Veil
talents.description: Activate to increase the armor bonus of Ogre Hide by 300% for 2 seconds. If cast while Ogre Rage is active, it instantly swaps to Ogre Hide.

talents.name: ChoTalentMoltenBlock
talents.title: Molten Block
talents.description: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 92 (+4% per level) damage per second.

talents.name: ChoCthunsGift
talents.title: C'Thun's Gift
talents.description: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and slows targets by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: ChoFavorOfTheOldGods
talents.title: Favor of the Old Gods
talents.description: Upheaval roots enemy Heroes for 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: ChoTheWillofCho
talents.title: The Will of Cho
talents.description: Takedowns permanently increase the armor granted by Ogre Hide by 2, to a max of 50 extra armor.

talents.name: ChoHourofTwilight
talents.title: Hour of Twilight
talents.description: Decreases Cho'gall's death timer by 50%.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Sand Blast
abilities.description: After 1 second, fire a missile that deals 300 (+2% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit.  Quest: Hit 60 Heroes with Sand Blast. Consecutive hits without missing count as hitting 2 Heroes. Reward: Each Hero hit increases Sand Blast's damage by 5. Reward: After hitting 60 Heroes, casting Sand Blast leaves an Echo behind.  The next time Sand Blast is cast, the Echo also casts an untalented Sand Blast that deals 40% damage.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Dragon's Breath
abilities.description: Fire a blast into the air that lands after 1.5 seconds, dealing 480 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area.  Enemies cannot see where the blast will land.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Time Trap
abilities.description: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after 2 seconds. The first enemy Hero to touch it is placed in Time Stop for 2 seconds. Only 1 trap can exist at once.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Temporal Loop
abilities.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Slowing Sands
abilities.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Timewalker
abilities.description: You've traveled to the future, and as such, will learn your Talents 2 levels earlier than your teammates!

talents.name: ChromieDragonsBreathDeepBreathing
talents.title: Deep Breathing
talents.description: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 3, up to 60. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 140 and also increase Chromie's sight radius by 100%.

talents.name: ChromieDragonsBreathEnvelopingAssault
talents.title: Enveloping Assault
talents.description: Increases Dragon's Breath's radius by 25%.

talents.name: ChromieDragonsBreathMobiusLoop
talents.title: Mobius Loop
talents.description: Reduces Dragon's Breath's Mana cost and cooldown by 50%, but also reduces its damage by 25%.

talents.name: ChromieHeroicAbilitySlowingSands
talents.title: Slowing Sands
talents.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

talents.name: ChromieQuantumOverdrive
talents.title: Quantum Overdrive
talents.description: Activate to increase Ability Power by 20% for 10 seconds.

talents.name: ChromieSandBlastPiercingSands
talents.title: Piercing Sands
talents.description: Sand Blast will now hit all Heroes in its path. Additional hits do not grant bonus damage or Quest progress.

talents.name: ChromieSandBlastShiftingSands
talents.title: Shifting Sands
talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast grants 8% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 40%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by Sand Blast.

talents.name: ChromieTimewalkersPursuit
talents.title: Timewalker's Pursuit
talents.description: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds. Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Chromie's Mana Regeneration by 0.1, up to 1.5. Reward: After gathering 15 Globes Chromie also gains 5% Ability Power.

talents.name: ChromieBronzeTalons
talents.title: Bronze Talons
talents.description: Increases Chromie's Basic Attack range by 35%. Using Sand Blast increases the damage of her next Basic Attack by 250%.

talents.name: ChromieDragonsBreathDragonsEye
talents.title: Dragon's Eye
talents.description: Dragon's Breath does 25% more damage to enemies in the center.

talents.name: ChromieTimeOut
talents.title: Time Out
talents.description: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 7 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

talents.name: ChromieHeroicAbilityTemporalLoop
talents.title: Temporal Loop
talents.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.

talents.name: ChromiePortBackToBaseByeBye
talents.title: Bye Bye!
talents.description: Reduces the cast time of Hearthstone by 75%, and it is not interrupted by taking damage.

talents.name: ChromieSlowingSandsPocketOfTime
talents.title: Pocket of Time
talents.description: Removes Slowing Sands Mana cost and increases the slow from 60% to 80%.

talents.name: ChromieSandBlastMountingSand
talents.title: Mounting Sand
talents.description: Hitting 3 or more consecutive Sand Blasts without missing counts as hitting 3 Heroes.

talents.name: ChromieTimeTrapTimelySurprise
talents.title: Timely Surprise
talents.description: Increase Time Trap's cast range by 33%. Additionally, the cooldowns of Sand Blast and Dragon's Breath are reset when Time Trap is triggered.

talents.name: ChromieTimeTrapChronoSickness
talents.title: Chrono Sickness
talents.description: Reduce Time Trap's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%. After the Time Stop ends, the enemy is also Slowed by 50% for 4 seconds.

talents.name: ChromieHereAndThere
talents.title: Here and There
talents.description: Activate to swap Chromie's position with her Sand Blast Echo.

talents.name: ChromieSandBlastFastForward
talents.title: Fast Forward
talents.description: If Sand Blast travels at least 75% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.75 seconds.

talents.name: ChromieTemporalLoopStuckInALoop
talents.title: Stuck in a Loop
talents.description: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first.

talents.name: ChromieTimeTrapAndorhalAnomaly
talents.title: Andorhal Anomaly
talents.description: Time Trap gains 2 charges, and when the cooldown finishes, Chromie gains all charges at once. Maximum 3 active Time Traps.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Boosters
abilities.description: Increase D.Va's Movement Speed by 125% for 2 seconds. Enemies that are hit take 135 (+4% per level) damage and are knocked away. D.Va cannot be Slowed while Boosters are active.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Defense Matrix
abilities.description: Channel a defensive field in the target direction for 3 seconds, reducing damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside it by 75%. The Mech can move while channeling, but cannot turn. Damage dealt to the Mech by enemies within Defense Matrix still grants the same amount of Self-Destruct Charge.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Self-Destruct
abilities.description: Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct after 4 seconds. Deals 400 to 1200 (+4% per level) damage in a large area, depending on distance from center. Only deals 50% damage against Structures. Gain 1% Charge for every 2 seconds spent Basic Attacking, and 30% Charge per 100% of Mech Health lost.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Bunny Hop
abilities.description: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Big Shot
abilities.description: Deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.  Requires Pilot Mode.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Mech Mode
abilities.description: When D.Va's Mech dies, she is ejected out after 0.75 seconds and can continue to fight. D.Va's Mech only awards 50% of a normal Hero's experience upon dying.

abilities.name: E2
abilities.title: Call Mech
abilities.description: Call a new Mech and enter Mech Mode. Basic Attacks lower this cooldown by 0.5 seconds each.

abilities.name: D2
abilities.title: Pilot Mode
abilities.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Call Mech by 0.5 seconds. As a Pilot, D.Va only awards 50% of a normal Hero's experience upon dying.

talents.name: DVaBoostersHitTheNitrous
talents.title: Hit The Nitrous
talents.description: Initial speed of Boosters increased to 325%, then decays to normal speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time Boosters deals 50% extra damage.

talents.name: DVaSelfDestructBringItOn
talents.title: Bring It On
talents.description: Self-Destruct's Charge amount gained from losing Mech Health is increased by 30%.

talents.name: DVaDefenseMatrixDazerZone
talents.title: Dazer Zone
talents.description: Enemy Heroes affected by Defense Matrix are Slowed by 20%.

talents.name: DVaBunnyHop
talents.title: Bunny Hop
talents.description: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.

talents.name: DVaMechEmergencyShielding
talents.title: Emergency Shielding
talents.description: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 210 (+4% per level) damage over 6 seconds. This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

talents.name: DVaDefenseMatrixFusionGenerator
talents.title: Fusion Generator
talents.description: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by 1%. Max of 15% Charge gained per use.

talents.name: DVaSelfDestructNuclearOption
talents.title: Nuclear Option
talents.description: Increase Self-Destruct's detonation timer by 3 seconds. Detonation damage increased by 50%.  A new Mech can still be called after 4 seconds.

talents.name: DVaBigShot
talents.title: Big Shot
talents.description: Deal 250 damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.  Requires Pilot Mode.

talents.name: DVaMechAblativeArmor
talents.title: Ablative Armor
talents.description: Damage against D.Va's Mech that would deal 4% or less of its maximum health are reduced by 50%.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

talents.name: DVaPilotGGWP
talents.title: GG, WP
talents.description: Increase Pilot Mode Basic Attack damage by 50%. Participating in a Takedown while in Pilot Mode instantly refreshes the cooldown of Call Mech.

talents.name: DVaBoostersRushdown
talents.title: Rush-down
talents.description: If D.Va neither takes nor deals damage during Boosters, its cooldown is lowered by 5 seconds.

talents.name: DVaMechExpensivePlating
talents.title: Expensive Plating
talents.description: Increase Mech health by 20%, but also increase the cooldown of Call Mech by 15 seconds.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

talents.name: DVaPilotNanoweaveSuit
talents.title: Nanoweave Suit
talents.description: For 4 seconds after ejecting from her Mech, D.Va gains 50 Armor and her Basic Attacks grant 50% more cooldown reduction towards Call Mech.

talents.name: DVaBoostersComingThrough
talents.title: Coming Through
talents.description: Knockback distance of Boosters is increased by 100%.

talents.name: DVaBigShotPewPewPew
talents.title: Pew! Pew! Pew!
talents.description: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.5 seconds. Each shot deals 50% damage.

talents.name: DVaPilotTorpedoDash
talents.title: Torpedo Dash
talents.description: D.Va gains the Torpedo Dash ability, allowing her to dash forward and pass through enemies. Requires Pilot Mode.

talents.name: DVaBunnyHopStopAndPop
talents.title: Stop and Pop
talents.description: Bunny Hop deals 150% more damage if D.Va isn't moving at the moment of impact.

talents.name: DVaPilotCallMechMEKAfall
talents.title: MEKAfall
talents.description: Call Mech is instant and can target a location. Upon landing, the Mech deals 202 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the impact area.

talents.name: DVaDefenseMatrixDivertingPower
talents.title: Diverting Power
talents.description: The area of Defense Matrix is 100% wider and 25% longer, but D.Va's Movement Speed is reduced by an additional 50% for the duration.

talents.name: DVaBoostersCrashCourse
talents.title: Crash Course
talents.description: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Boosters. Reward: After damaging 25 Heroes, each use of Boosters lowers its cooldown by 1 second per Hero hit.

talents.name: DVaMechProMoves
talents.title: Pro Moves
talents.description: D.Va's Mech gains 2% Movement Speed for 1.25 second every time it takes damage, up to 30%.

talents.name: DVaDefenseMatrixGetThroughThis
talents.title: Get through This!
talents.description: Increase the duration of Defense Matrix by 3 seconds.

talents.name: DVaDefenseMatrixAggressionMatrix
talents.title: Aggression Matrix
talents.description: Basic Attacks in Mech Mode against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.25 seconds.

talents.name: DVaPilotSuppressingFire
talents.title: Suppressing Fire
talents.description: Pilot Mode Basic Attacks have 20% increased range and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: DVaPilotConcussivePulse
talents.title: Concussive Pulse
talents.description: D.Va gains the Concussive Pulse ability, allowing her to deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back. Requires Pilot Mode.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Drag
abilities.description: Lash out with your tongue, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit, stunning and dragging them with you for 1.75 seconds.  If you are stunned or silenced while using Drag, the effect ends.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Dark Swarm
abilities.description: Deal 47 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies for 3.5 seconds. While active, you are able to move through units.  Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Burrow
abilities.description: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Isolation
abilities.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage, silencing and slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Only allows them to see a very short distance for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Adaptation
abilities.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Essence Collection
abilities.description: Gain 10 Essence from Takedowns and 2 Essence from nearby Minions dying.  Activate to consume all Essence and heal yourself for 29 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds for each Essence stored.  Maximum of 50 Essence.  Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

abilities.name: Z1
abilities.title: Brushstalker
abilities.description: Activate to burrow to a bush on the battleground.  Passive: Gain 20% movement speed while in a bush and for 2 second after leaving.

talents.name: DehakaEssenceCollectionTalentTissueRegeneration
talents.title: Tissue Regeneration
talents.description: Regneration Globes grant 10 Essence.  Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases Health Regeneration by 4, up to 40, and maximum Essence by 1, up to 10.

talents.name: DehakaEssenceCollectionOneWhoCollectsTalent
talents.title: One-Who-Collects
talents.description: Increases Essence collected from Minions by 50%.

talents.name: DehakaDragTalentFeedingFrenzy
talents.title: Feeding Frenzy
talents.description: Basic Attacks reduce Drag's cooldown by 2 seconds.

talents.name: DehakaHeroicAbilityIsolation
talents.title: Isolation
talents.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage, silencing and slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Only allows them to see a very short distance for 6 seconds.

talents.name: DehakaPrimalRage
talents.title: Primal Rage
talents.description: Gain 1% increased Attack Damage per Essence stored.

talents.name: DehakaDragTalentElongatedTongue
talents.title: Elongated Tongue
talents.description: Increase Drag range by 20%.

talents.name: DehakaDarkSwarmTalentSymbiosis
talents.title: Symbiosis
talents.description: Every time Dark Swarm damages an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.4 seconds.

talents.name: DehakaTunnelingClaws
talents.title: Tunneling Claws
talents.description: Dehaka can move while Burrowed.

talents.name: DehakaBurrowTalentLurkerStrain
talents.title: Lurker Strain
talents.description: Emerging from Burrow grants Dehaka Stealth for 3 seconds and also knocks nearby enemies back, slowing them by 30% for 2 seconds.

talents.name: DehakaPrimalSwarm
talents.title: Primal Swarm
talents.description: Dark Swarm causes enemies hit to lose 10 Armor for 0.75 seconds, causing them to take 10% extra damage.

talents.name: DehakaBrushstalkerApexPredator
talents.title: Apex Predator
talents.description: Reduces Brushstalker's cooldown by 25 seconds and the cast time by 0.5 seconds.

talents.name: DehakaDragTalentConstriction
talents.title: Constriction
talents.description: Increases Drag duration by 0.5 seconds.

talents.name: DehakaHeroicAbilityAdaptation
talents.title: Adaptation
talents.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

talents.name: DehakaEssenceCollectionTalentHeroStalker
talents.title: Hero Stalker
talents.description: Increases Essence gained from Takedowns by 100%.

talents.name: DehakaEssenceClaws
talents.title: Essence Claws
talents.description: Dehaka's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1 second. If the target is a Hero, Dehaka gains 5 Essence.

talents.name: DehakaEssenceCollectionTalentEnhancedAgility
talents.title: Enhanced Agility
talents.description: Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus now lasts 5 seconds after leaving a bush.  Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases the Movement Speed bonus of Brushstalker by 2% up to 20%.

talents.name: DehakaBrushstalkerFerociousStalker
talents.title: Ferocious Stalker
talents.description: Dark Swarm deals 40% more damage while Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus is active.

talents.name: DehakaDragTalentParalyzingEnzymes
talents.title: Paralyzing Enzymes
talents.description: Drag slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds after it ends.

talents.name: DehakaDarkSwarmTalentEnduringSwarm
talents.title: Enduring Swarm
talents.description: Dark Swarm grants 40 Spell Armor, reducing Ability damage taken by 40%.

talents.name: DehakaIsolationTalentContagion
talents.title: Contagion
talents.description: Isolation hits all Heroes near the first target.

talents.name: DehakaAdaptationChangeIsSurvivalTalent
talents.title: Change Is Survival
talents.description: Increases Adaptation healing to 200% of the damage received and reduces the cooldown by 30 seconds.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Shadow Charge
abilities.description: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage and gaining 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%. If the enemy collides with terrain, they are stunned for 1 second and take an additional 150 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Fire Stomp
abilities.description: Unleashes fire waves in all directions that deal 54 (+4% per level) damage each. Once they reach maximum range, they return dealing an additional 81 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Overpower
abilities.description: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing 73 (+4% per level) damage and stunning for 0.25 seconds.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Apocalypse
abilities.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Lightning Breath
abilities.description: Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 800 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.  The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Black Soulstone
abilities.description: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed and 1 Soul per Minion, up to 100. For each Soul, gain 0.4% maximum Health. If Diablo has 100 Souls upon dying, he will resurrect in 5 seconds but lose 100 Souls.

talents.name: DiabloLifeLeech
talents.title: Life Leech
talents.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Diablo for the same amount.

talents.name: DiabloMasteryFromTheShadowsShadowCharge
talents.title: From the Shadows
talents.description: Increases the cast range of Shadow Charge by 40%.

talents.name: DiabloMasterySoulFeastBlackSoulstone
talents.title: Soul Feast
talents.description: Black Soulstone increases Diablo's Health Regeneration by 0.4 per second per Soul.

talents.name: DiabloHeroicAbilityApocalypse
talents.title: Apocalypse
talents.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning for 1.75 seconds.

talents.name: DiabloMasteryFireDevilFireStomp
talents.title: Fire Devil
talents.description: Fire Stomp increases Diablo's Basic Attack damage by 20% and surrounds Diablo in flames that deal 20 (+4% per level) damage every second. Lasts 6 seconds.

talents.name: DiabloTalentDominationOverpower
talents.title: Domination
talents.description: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

talents.name: DiabloMasteryDyingBreathApocalypse
talents.title: Dying Breath
talents.description: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds and is cast for free when Diablo dies.

talents.name: DiabloHeroicAbilityLightningBreath
talents.title: Lightning Breath
talents.description: Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 800 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.  The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.

talents.name: DiabloDevastatingCharge
talents.title: Devastating Charge
talents.description: Shadow Charge's terrain collision against Heroes deals an additional 5% of the target's maximum life. Quest: Each time an enemy Hero takes terrain collision damage, increase the maximum life damage by 2%, to a maximum of 10% bonus.

talents.name: DiabloDebilitatingFlames
talents.title: Debilitating Flames
talents.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are slowed by 15% for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

talents.name: DiabloTalentLordOfTerror
talents.title: Lord of Terror
talents.description: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes.

talents.name: DiabloMasteryDemonicStrength
talents.title: Demonic Strength
talents.description: Once Overpower's stun expires, the target is slowed by 30% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: DiabloDiabolicalMomentum
talents.title: Diabolical Momentum
talents.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Overpower and Shadow Charge by 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: DiabloMasteryDevilsDueBlackSoulstone
talents.title: Devil's Due
talents.description: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2% per Soul.

talents.name: DiabloBulwark
talents.title: Bulwark
talents.description: Increases the duration of Armor granted by Shadow Charge from 2 seconds to 4 seconds.

talents.name: DiabloSoulShield
talents.title: Soul Shield
talents.description: Black Soulstone grants Diablo 0.25 Spell Armor per soul, reducing Ability Damage taken by 0.25% per Soul.

talents.name: DiabloSpeedDemon
talents.title: Speed Demon
talents.description: Being Stunned or Rooted increases Diablo's Movement Speed by 30% for 5 seconds.

talents.name: DiabloHellfire
talents.title: Hellfire
talents.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp increases the damage of the next Fire Stomp by 12%, up to 120%.

talents.name: DiabloHellgate
talents.title: Hellgate
talents.description: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.

talents.name: DiabloMasteryHellstormLightningBreath
talents.title: Hellstorm
talents.description: Lightning Breath lasts and reaches 50% longer.

talents.name: DiabloFearfulPresence
talents.title: Fearful Presence
talents.description: Activate to reduce the damage dealt by nearby enemy Heroes by 30% for 3 seconds. Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Diablo have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Powerslide

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Face Melt
abilities.description: Deals 68 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Guitar Solo

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Mosh Pit

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Stage Dive
abilities.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Rockstar
abilities.description: After E.T.C. uses a Basic or Heroic ability, he gains 20 Armor for 2 seconds. This effect does not stack with itself.

talents.name: GenericTalentImposingPresence

talents.name: ETCMasteryGuitarHero

talents.name: ETCCrowdSurfer

talents.name: ETCHeroicAbilityMoshPit

talents.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

talents.name: ETCMasteryEncore

talents.name: GenericTalentFlashoftheStorms

talents.name: ETCBlockParty

talents.name: L90ETCMasteryFaceMeltLoudSpeakers
talents.title: Loud Speakers
talents.description: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.

talents.name: ETCHeroicAbilityStageDive
talents.title: Stage Dive
talents.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: ETCMasteryFaceSmelt
talents.title: Face Smelt
talents.description: Face Melt slows enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.

talents.name: GenericTalentStormShield
talents.title: Storm Shield
talents.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

talents.name: ETCMasteryProgRock
talents.title: Prog Rock
talents.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100. Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 50 (+4% per level) Health every second while it is active.

talents.name: ETCMasteryGuitarSoloAggressiveShredding
talents.title: Aggressive Shredding
talents.description: E.T.C.'s Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Guitar Solo by 0.75 seconds.

talents.name: L90ETCMasteryDeathMetal
talents.title: Death Metal

talents.name: ETCMasterySpeedMetal

talents.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

talents.name: ETCMasteryHammeron
talents.title: Hammer-on
talents.description: After using an Ability, your next 2 Basic Attacks deal 35% more damage.

talents.name: ETCCombatStyleEchoPedal
talents.title: Echo Pedal
talents.description: Using a Basic or Heroic Ability releases two pulses of 15 (+4% per level) damage. This deals 250% bonus damage to Minions and Mercenaries. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.

talents.name: ETCMasteryMicCheck
talents.title: Mic Check
talents.description: Hitting at least 2 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 6 seconds.

talents.name: ETCMasteryShowStopper

talents.description: After using Powerslide, gain 15 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing all damage taken by 15%.

talents.name: L90ETCMasteryStageDiveCrowdPleaser

talents.description: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

talents.name: L90ETCMasteryMoshPitTourBus

abilities.name: Q1

abilities.name: E1

abilities.name: R1

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Mighty Gust

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Tailwind

abilities.name: Z1
abilities.title: Flight

talents.name: FalstadHeroicAbilityHinterlandBlast

talents.name: GenericTalentNexusFrenzy

talents.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage.  Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

talents.name: FalstadMasteryHammerangSecretWeapon
talents.title: Secret Weapon
talents.description: Increases Hammerang's range by 30% and Basic Attacks deal 60% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.

talents.name: FalstadMasteryLightningRodThunderstrikes

talents.name: FalstadMasteryAerieGustsTailwind

talents.name: FalstadHeroicAbilityMightyGust

talents.name: FalstadMasteryUpdraftBarrelRoll

talents.name: FalstadMasteryCalloftheWildhammerHinterlandBlast

talents.name: FalstadMasteryMightyGustWindTunnel

abilities.name: Q1

talents.name: GallOgreRampage

talents.name: GallHeroicAbilityShadowboltVolley

talents.name: GallSearingShadows

talents.name: GallRisingDread

talents.name: GallTwilightNova

talents.name: GallShadowsnare

talents.name: GallLeadenOrb

talents.name: GallShadowboltVolleyShadowfury

talents.name: GallShiftingNether

abilities.name: Q1

talents.name: GarroshGroundbreakerRoughLanding

talents.name: GarroshBloodthirstBloodcraze

talents.name: TinkerCombatStyleReduceReuseRecycle

talents.name: TinkerMasteryHyperfocusCoils

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Shuriken
abilities.description: Throw 3 Shuriken in a spread pattern, each dealing 65 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.  Stores up to 3 charges. Shuriken's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Deflect
abilities.description: Become Protected for 1.25 seconds. Any damage blocked during this period causes Genji to throw a Kunai toward the nearest enemy, prioritizing Heroes and dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Swift Strike
abilities.description: Dash forward, dealing 215 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Enemy Heroes that die within 2 seconds of being hit with Swift Strike cause the cooldown and mana cost to be refunded.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Dragonblade
abilities.description: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage. If enemy Heroes are killed within 2 seconds of being hit by Dragonblade, Swift Strike's cooldown is reset.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: X-Strike
abilities.description: Perform two slashes dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 270 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Cyber Agility
abilities.description: Activate to jump to the target area.

talents.name: GenjiCyberAgilityAgileDismount
talents.title: Agile Dismount
talents.description: While mounted, the range of Cyber Agility is increased by 70% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

talents.name: GenjiShurikenShurikenMastery
talents.title: Shuriken Mastery
talents.description: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Shuriken.  Reward: After hitting 35 Heroes, Shuriken damage is increased by 25.  Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes, Cyber Agility now refunds 2 charges of Shuriken.

talents.name: GenjiDeflectPerfectDefense
talents.title: Perfect Defense
talents.description: Deflected damage reduces the cooldown of Deflect by 2 seconds, up to a maximum of 10 seconds.

talents.name: GenjiHeroicDragonblade
talents.title: Dragonblade
talents.description: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage. If enemy Heroes are killed within 2 seconds of being hit by Dragonblade, Swift Strike's cooldown is reset.

talents.name: GenjiShurikenShingan
talents.title: Shingan
talents.description: Hitting an enemy with all 3 Shuriken deals 115 (+4% per level) bonus damage.

talents.name: GenjiDeflectReflect
talents.title: Reflect
talents.description: Deflect also deals an additional 33% of the damage blocked.

talents.name: GenjiSwiftStrikeSwiftAsTheWind
talents.title: Swift as the Wind
talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Swift Strike increases Genji's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: GenjiHeroicXStrike
talents.title: X-Strike
talents.description: Perform two slashes dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 270 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.

talents.name: GenjiDeflectZanshin
talents.title: Zanshin
talents.description: Quest: Block 6500 damage with Deflect, including damage blocked so far.  Reward: Deflect hits all nearby enemy Heroes.

talents.name: GenjiSwiftStrikeFlowLikeWater
talents.title: Flow Like Water
talents.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Swift Strike reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

talents.name: GenjiSwiftStrikeFinalCut
talents.title: Final Cut
talents.description: After 1 second, Swift Strike deals an additional 125 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in the area.

talents.name: GenjiCyberAgilityPathfinder
talents.title: Pathfinder
talents.description: Jumping over terrain with Cyber Agility increases Genji's Movement Speed by 25% for 6 seconds.

talents.name: GenjiCyberAgilityCyberShield

talents.name: GenjiXStrikeLivingWeapon
talents.title: Living Weapon
talents.description: Each enemy Hero hit by X-Strike reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.

talents.name: GenjiDeflectAugmentedGuard
talents.title: Augmented Guard
talents.description: When Deflect ends, Genji gains a Shield equal to 50% of the damage blocked for 4 seconds.

talents.name: GenjiSwiftStrikeSteadyBlade
talents.title: Steady Blade
talents.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Swift Strike increases the damage of the next Swift Strike by 20%. This bonus stacks up to 3 times.

talents.name: GenjiShurikenSharpenedStars
talents.title: Sharpened Stars

talents.name: GenjiDodge
talents.title: Dodge
talents.description: Genji dodges 1 Heroic Basic Attack every 8 seconds.

talents.name: GenjiSwiftStrikeStrikeAtTheHeart
talents.title: Strike At The Heart
talents.description: Enemies hit by the end of Swift Strike take an additional 138 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds.

talents.name: GenjiDragonbladeTheDragonBecomesMe
talents.title: The Dragon Becomes Me
talents.description: Each time Dragonblade hits an enemy Hero, the duration of Dragonblade is increased by 1 second.

talents.name: GenjiCyberAgilityDoubleJump
talents.title: Double Jump
talents.description: Cyber Agility stores 2 charges but its cooldown is increased by 5 seconds.

talents.name: GenjiDeflectDragonClaw
talents.title: Dragon Claw
talents.description: After Genji blocks 330 (+4% per level) damage with Deflect, activate to release a Dragon Claw, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Gilnean Cocktail
abilities.description: Hurl a flask that deals 59 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 236 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone behind them.  Worgen: Razor Swipe  Swipe forward and damage enemies you pass through.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Inner Beast
abilities.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration, and reduce the cooldown of Inner Beast by 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Darkflight
abilities.description: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing 88 (+4% per level) damage.  Worgen: Disengage  Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Go for the Throat
abilities.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Cursed Bullet
abilities.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Curse of the Worgen
abilities.description: Use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen.  While Human, your Basic Attack is ranged.  While Worgen, your Basic Attack is melee but deals 40% more damage and gain 10 Armor, taking 10% less damage.

abilities.name: Q2
abilities.title: Razor Swipe
abilities.description: Swipe towards the area in front of you for 135 (+4% per level) damage.  Human: Gilnean Cocktail  Damage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them.

abilities.name: E2
abilities.title: Disengage
abilities.description: Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.  Human: Darkflight  Leap at an enemy and shapeshift into a Worgen.

talents.name: HeroGenericExecutionerPassive
talents.title: Executioner
talents.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: GreymaneGilneanCocktailPerfectAim
talents.title: Perfect Aim
talents.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range by 30% and refunds 50 Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.

talents.name: GreymaneGilneanCocktailDraughtOverflow
talents.title: Draught Overflow
talents.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's explosion length by 35%.

talents.name: GreymaneGilneanCocktailIncendiaryElixir
talents.title: Incendiary Elixir
talents.description: Quest: Every time Greymane hits an enemy Hero with the explosion damage from Gilnean Cocktail, increase its explosion damage by 15, up to 225. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, the cooldown is also reduced by 4 seconds.

talents.name: GreymaneHeroicAbilityCursedBullet
talents.title: Cursed Bullet
talents.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.

talents.name: GreymaneDarkflightDisengageRunningWild
