talents.description: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%.

talents.name: GreymaneHuntersBlunderbuss
talents.title: Hunter's Blunderbuss
talents.description: Human Basic Attacks splash for 100% damage behind the target.

talents.name: GreymaneRazorSwipeVisceralAttacks
talents.title: Visceral Attacks
talents.description: Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1 second.

talents.name: GreymaneWorgenFormAlphaKiller
talents.title: Alpha Killer
talents.description: Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

talents.name: GreymaneHeroicAbilityGoForTheThroat
talents.title: Go for the Throat
talents.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

talents.name: GreymaneEagerWolf
talents.title: Eager Wolf
talents.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Inner Beast by an additional 40% after it has been active for 4 seconds.

talents.name: GreymaneWorgenFormQuicksilverBullets
talents.title: Quicksilver Bullets
talents.description: Increases Greymane's Human Basic Attack range by 1.1.

talents.name: GreymaneInnerBeastOnTheProwl
talents.title: On the Prowl

talents.name: GreymaneInnerBeastViciousness
talents.title: Viciousness
talents.description: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

talents.name: GreymaneDisengageEyesInTheDark
talents.title: Eyes in the Dark
talents.description: Disengage grants Stealth for 3 seconds.

talents.name: GreymaneWizenedDuelist
talents.title: Wizened Duelist
talents.description: Quest: Hero takedowns increase Basic Attack damage by 3%, up to 30%. This bonus is lost on death.

talents.name: GreymaneRazorSwipeUnfetteredAssault
talents.title: Unfettered Assault
talents.description: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%.

talents.name: GreymaneInnerBeastWolfheart
talents.title: Wolfheart
talents.description: Increase the cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks during Inner Beast from 0.5 to 1 second.

talents.name: GreymaneGoForTheThroatUnleashed
talents.title: Unleashed
talents.description: If the free cast of Go for the Throat kills its target, another free cast is provided that deals 35% more damage, up to 140%.

talents.name: GreymaneDarkflightThickSkin
talents.title: Thick Skin
talents.description: Using Darkflight grants 50 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks while in Worgen Form, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

talents.name: GreymaneToothAndClaw
talents.title: Tooth and Claw
talents.description: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage.

talents.name: GreymaneInnerBeastInsatiable
talents.title: Insatiable
talents.description: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore 10 Mana.

talents.name: GreymaneCursedBulletGilneanRoulette
talents.title: Gilnean Roulette
talents.description: Cursed Bullet now hits all enemy heroes in its path and has its cooldown reduced by 5 seconds per hit.

abilities.name: Q1

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Corruption
abilities.description: Call forth three bursts of shadow energy, dealing 204 (+4.5% per level) damage over 6 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Horrify

abilities.title: Rain of Destruction
abilities.description: Summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Life Tap
abilities.description: Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana.  Activate to restore 25% mana at a cost of 222 Life.

talents.name: GuldanFelFlamePursuitOfFlame
talents.title: Pursuit of Flame
talents.description: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame. Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

talents.name: GuldanFelFlameBoundByShadow

talents.name: GuldanRainOfDestruction

talents.name: GuldanCorruptionEchoedCorruption

talents.name: GuldanDrainLifeHealthFunnel

talents.name: GuldanHorrify
talents.title: Horrify
talents.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 (+4% per level) damage and fear enemy Heroes in the area for 2 seconds.

talents.name: GuldanHealthstone

talents.name: GuldanFelFlameRampantHellfire
talents.title: Rampant Hellfire

talents.name: GuldanConsumeSoul

talents.name: GuldanDrainLifeDevourTheFrail

talents.name: GuldanDarkBargain

talents.name: GuldanCorruptionRuinousAffliction

talents.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

talents.name: IllidanFieryBrand

talents.name: IllidanBladesOfAzzinoth

talents.name: GenericTalentFlashoftheStorms

talents.name: GenericTalentNexusBlades

talents.name: IllidanMasteryImmolationSweepingStrike

talents.name: IllidanMasteryMarkedforDeathDive

talents.name: LeoricBurningDespairTalent

talents.description: Deal 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. The damage and area is increased by 100% while Drain Hope is active.

talents.name: LeoricShroudoftheDeadKingTalent

talents.description: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage.

After 10 seconds, or when the Ability is activated again, the Medivac will travel to the original cast location to unload its passengers. Cooldown is shared with Medivac Dropship. Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Medivac Dropship from 60 to 30 seconds.

abilities.title: March of the Murlocs
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Octo-Grab
abilities.description: Murky summons an octopus to stun target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Spawn Egg
abilities.description: Place an Egg at target location, revealing the nearby area. Upon dying, Murky respawns at the Egg after 8 seconds. Murky only grants 25% of a real Hero's experience upon dying.  If Murky's Egg is killed, he is revealed to enemies for 15 seconds, and Spawn Egg is placed on cooldown.

talents.name: MurkyAFishyDeal
talents.title: A Fishy Deal
talents.description: Killing a Minion with Pufferfish grants a stack of Bribe. Use 8 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 32 stacks.

talents.name: MurkySlimeTime
talents.title: Slime Time
talents.description: Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed.  Reward: After Sliming 15 Heroes, increase Slime's bonus damage by 125.  Reward: After Sliming 30 Heroes, increase Slime's slow amount to 30%.

talents.name: MurkyBlackLagoon
talents.title: Black Lagoon
talents.description: Increase Slime's radius by 30%.

talents.name: MurkyHeroicAbilityMarchoftheMurlocs
talents.title: March of the Murlocs
talents.description: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

talents.name: MurkyMasteryRejuvenatingBubble
talents.title: Rejuvenating Bubble
talents.description: Safety Bubble restores 40% of Murky's maximum Health.

talents.name: MurkyToxicBuildup
talents.title: Toxic Buildup
talents.description: Every 3rd consecutive Basic Attack against an enemy Hero causes a free Slime to be cast upon them.

talents.name: MurkyTimetoKrill
talents.title: Time to Krill
talents.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 7 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow the target by 7% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

talents.name: MurkyEggShell
talents.title: Egg Shell
talents.description: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.

talents.name: MurkyMasteryNeverEndingMurlocs
talents.title: Never-Ending Murlocs
talents.description: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely.

talents.name: MurkyFishTank
talents.title: Fish Tank
talents.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes grants Murky 75 Physical Armor against Heroes for 3 seconds.

talents.name: MurkyBigTunaKahuna
talents.title: Big Tuna Kahuna
talents.description: Murky's maximum Health and Egg respawn time are doubled.

talents.name: MurkyLivingtheDream
talents.title: Living the Dream
talents.description: Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Ability Power, up to 15%. This bonus is reset upon his death.

talents.name: MurkyFishOil
talents.title: Fish Oil
talents.description: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.

talents.name: MurkyHeroicAbilityOctoGrab
talents.title: Octo-Grab
talents.description: Murky summons an octopus to stun target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

talents.name: MurkyFishEye
talents.title: Fish Eye
talents.description: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.

talents.name: MurkyEggHunt
talents.title: Egg Hunt
talents.description: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it casts an untalented Slime. Maximum 3 fake Eggs.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for 5 seconds.

talents.name: MurkyMasteryTufferfish
talents.title: Tufferfish
talents.description: Pufferfish gains 50 Spell Armor and deals 50% more damage to Slimed targets.

talents.name: MurkySlipperyWhenWet
talents.title: Slippery When Wet
talents.description: Gain 50% Movement Speed and move through units while in Safety Bubble.  Reduces Safety Bubble's cooldown by 2 seconds.

talents.name: MurkyMasteryWrathOfCod
talents.title: Wrath of Cod
talents.description: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds.

talents.name: MurkyMasteryAndASharkToo
talents.title: ... And a Shark Too!
talents.description: Increase the damage of Octo-Grab by 13700%.

talents.name: MurkyMakingInky
talents.title: Making Inky
talents.description: Reduces the Cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Corpse Spiders
abilities.description: Hurl a jar of spiders that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage. If it hits at least one enemy, create 3 Corpse Spiders that attack for 35 (+4% per level) damage. Spiders last for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Zombie Wall
abilities.description: After 1 second, create a ring of Zombies surrounding the target area that deal 28 (+4% per level) damage and last for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Plague of Toads
abilities.description: Create a wave of 3 Toads that explode on contact, dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage over 6 seconds. This effect stacks.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Gargantuan
abilities.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 150 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Ravenous Spirit
abilities.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 206 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Voodoo Ritual
abilities.description: Your Basic Attacks and Abilities poison Non-Heroic enemies, causing them to take 66 (+4% per level) additional damage over 6 seconds.  If a Minion dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, you permanently gain 4 Health and 1 Mana.

talents.name: WitchDoctorPandemic
talents.title: Pandemic
talents.description: Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it spawns 2 additional toads.

talents.name: WitchDoctorBloodRitual
talents.title: Blood Ritual
talents.description: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore 1.95% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana.

talents.name: WitchDoctorToadsofHugeness
talents.title: Toads of Hugeness
talents.description: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 25% after each hop, up to a maximum of 100%.

talents.name: WitchDoctorHeroicAbilityGargantuan
talents.title: Gargantuan
talents.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 150 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

talents.name: WitchDoctorGuardianToads
talents.title: Guardian Toads
talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads gives 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

talents.name: WitchDoctorRingOfPoison
talents.title: Ring of Poison
talents.description: Zombie Wall lasts 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 318.75 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.

talents.name: WitchDoctorVileInfection
talents.title: Vile Infection
talents.description: Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased by 200%.

talents.name: WitchDoctorBigVoodoo
talents.title: Big Voodoo
talents.description: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.

talents.name: GenericTalentIceBlock
talents.title: Ice Block
talents.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

talents.name: WitchDoctorSpiderColony
talents.title: Spider Colony
talents.description: Corpse Spiders' cooldown recharges 100% faster while above 850 Health.

talents.name: WitchDoctorWidowmakers
talents.title: Widowmakers
talents.description: Reward: After Corpse Spiders attack Heroes 100 times, their attack damage is increased by 30%.

talents.name: WitchDoctorHexedCrawlers
talents.title: Hexed Crawlers
talents.description: Corpse spiders restore 0.75% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana when they attack an enemy Hero.

talents.name: WitchDoctorSpiritofArachyr
talents.title: Spirit of Arachyr
talents.description: If Corpse Spiders hits only one enemy, it creates 2 additional spiders.

talents.name: WitchDoctorHeroicAbilityRavenousSpirits
talents.title: Ravenous Spirit
talents.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 206 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

talents.name: WitchDoctorSoulHarvest
talents.title: Soul Harvest
talents.description: Activate to increase Nazeebo's Health and Ability Power by 7% for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 35%. Lasts 15 seconds.

talents.name: GenericTalentFuryoftheStorm
talents.title: Fury of the Storm
talents.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

talents.name: WitchDoctorSuperstition
talents.title: Superstition
talents.description: Gain 40 Spell Armor, taking 40% less damage from Abilities, but lose 30 Physical Armor, taking 30% more damage from Basic Attacks.

talents.name: WitchDoctorAnnihilatingSpirits
talents.title: Annihilating Spirit
talents.description: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50% and Movement Speed by 30%.

talents.name: WitchDoctorThingOfTheDeep
talents.title: Thing of the Deep
talents.description: Increases the range of Nazeebo's Basic Abilities by 20%.

talents.name: WitchDoctorDeadRush
talents.title: Dead Rush
talents.description: Zombie Wall deals 75% more damage. When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

talents.name: WitchDoctorHumongoid
talents.title: Humongoid
talents.description: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 40 seconds and its Mana cost by 50%.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Snipe
abilities.description: Deals 310 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Pinning Shot
abilities.description: Deal 110 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and slow it by 40% for 2.25 seconds.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Holo Decoy
abilities.description: Create a Decoy for 5 seconds that appears to attack enemies.   Using this Ability does not break Cloak.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Triple Tap
abilities.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 338 (+4% per level) damage each.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Precision Strike
abilities.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 456 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Permanent Cloak
abilities.description: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds.  Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or channeling reveals you.

abilities.name: D2
abilities.title: Sniper
abilities.description: Nova's Basic Attack range is 1 further than most other ranged Heroes.

talents.name: NovaCovertOps
talents.title: Covert Ops
talents.description: After being Stealthed for 5 seconds, Pinning Shot's slow is increased to 55% and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for 1 second.

talents.name: NovaCovertMission
talents.title: Covert Mission
talents.description: Enemy Minions killed near you grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks of Bribe. Use 25 stacks to Bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

talents.name: NovaSnipeMaster
talents.title: Snipe Master
talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe permanently increases the damage of Snipe by 15%. Stacks up to 5 times. All stacks are lost if Snipe fails to hit an enemy.

talents.name: NovaHeroicAbilityPrecisionStrike
talents.title: Precision Strike
talents.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 456 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

talents.name: NovaMasteryExplosiveShot
talents.title: Explosive Round
talents.description: Snipe also deals 50% damage to enemies near the impact.

talents.name: NovaMasteryLethalDecoy
talents.title: Lethal Decoy
talents.description: Holo Decoy deals 40% of Nova's damage.

talents.name: NovaMasteryLongshot
talents.title: Longshot
talents.description: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by 2.

talents.name: NovaCombatStyleOneintheChamber
talents.title: One in the Chamber
talents.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 80% additional damage.

talents.name: NovaMasteryDoubleTap
talents.title: Double Tap
talents.description: Pinning Shot now has 2 charges.

talents.name: NovaMasteryCripplingShot
talents.title: Crippling Shot
talents.description: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by 25 for the duration of the slow, causing them to take 25% increased damage.

talents.name: GenericTalentRewind
talents.title: Rewind
talents.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

talents.name: NovaAdvancedCloaking
talents.title: Advanced Cloaking
talents.description: While Stealthed, Nova gains 2 Mana per second and 25% increased movement speed

talents.name: NovaHeroicAbilityTripleTap
talents.title: Triple Tap
talents.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 338 (+4% per level) damage each.

talents.name: NovaHoloStability
talents.title: Holo Stability
talents.description: Increase the cast range and duration of Holo Decoy by 100%.

talents.name: NovaGhostProtocol
talents.title: Ghost Protocol
talents.description: Activate to gain Stealth and become Unrevealable for 2 seconds. Your attacks and Abilities will also not break Stealth during this time.

talents.name: NovaMasteryFastReload
talents.title: Fast Reload
talents.description: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.

talents.name: NovaRapidProjection
talents.title: Rapid Projection
talents.description: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 40%.

talents.name: NovaMasteryPerfectShotSnipe
talents.title: Perfect Shot
talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe reduces the cooldown by 3 seconds.

talents.name: NovaMasteryPrecisionBarrage
talents.title: Precision Barrage
talents.description: Precision Strike holds 2 charges with a short cooldown.

talents.name: NovaMasteryPsionicEfficiency
talents.title: Psionic Efficiency
talents.description: Removes Snipe's Mana cost and increases its range by 15%.

talents.name: NovaCombatStyleAntiArmorShells
talents.title: Anti-Armor Shells
talents.description: Nova's Basic Attacks deal 250% damage and decrease the Armor of Heroic targets by 10 for 3 seconds, but her Attack Speed is proportionally slower.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Disruption Pulse
abilities.description: Fire a burst of energy forward, dealing 142 (+5% per level) damage to all enemies it passes through.  Hitting the center of a Warp Rift will cause it to explode, dealing additional damage.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Warp Rift
abilities.description: Open an unstable Warp Rift at a location that takes 1.25 seconds to arm, which then slows nearby enemies by 25% lasting 9 seconds.  Armed Warp Rifts explode when hit by Disruption Pulse, dealing 261 (+5% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Photon Cannon
abilities.description: Warp in a Photon Cannon that deals 105 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 13 seconds.  Must be placed within a Pylon's Power Field.  Deactivates if it doesn't have a Pylon powering it.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Pylon Overcharge
abilities.description: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Null Gate
abilities.description: Vector Targeting. Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 (+4% per level) damage per second and are slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Warp In Pylon
abilities.description: Warp in a Pylon that generates a Power Field and grants vision of the surrounding area. Probius only regenerates mana while inside a Power Field.  Up to 2 Pylons can be active at a time.

abilities.name: Z1
abilities.title: Worker Rush
abilities.description: Activate to gain an additional 50% Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Taking damage ends this effect early.  Passive: Probius moves 10% faster by hovering over the ground.

talents.name: ProbiusGatherMineralsPhotonCannonQuest
talents.title: Gather Minerals
talents.description: Quest: Enemy Heroes and Minions drop Minerals when killed. Collect them to increase the Health of Photon Cannons by 8, up to 560.  Reward: After collecting 70 Minerals, Photon Cannons deal 25% more damage, can see over obstacles, and reveal nearby Cloaked units.

talents.name: ProbiusShieldCapacitor
talents.title: Shield Capacitor
talents.description: Probius gains permanent Shields equal to 10% of his max Health. Shields regenerate quickly as long as he hasn't taken damage recently.

talents.name: ProbiusTowerDefensePhotonCannon
talents.title: Tower Defense
talents.description: When Photon Cannon damages an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.

talents.name: ProbiusPylonOverchargeHeroic
talents.title: Pylon Overcharge
talents.description: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

talents.name: ProbiusShieldBatteryWarpInPylon
talents.title: Shield Battery
talents.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 24 (+4% per level) Shields per second, up to 96. Shields persist for 4 seconds after exiting a Pylon Power Field.

talents.name: ProbiusGravityWellWarpRift
talents.title: Gravity Well
talents.description: Enemies are slowed more the closer they are to the center of the Warp Rift, up to a maximum slow of 60%.

talents.name: ProbiusConstructAdditionalPylonsPylonOvercharge
talents.title: Construct Additional Pylons
talents.description: Probius can now have up to 3 active Pylons, and increase the damage of Pylon Overcharge by 25%.

talents.name: ProbiusEchoPulseDisruptionPulse
talents.title: Echo Pulse
talents.description: Disruption Pulse now returns to Probius 1.25 seconds after reaching its target, dealing 75% damage on the return trip.

talents.name: ProbiusParticleAcceleratorDisruptionPulse
talents.title: Particle Accelerator
talents.description: Disruption Pulse deals 10% more damage for each enemy or Warp Rift hit, up to 50%.

talents.name: ProbiusNullGateHeroic
talents.title: Null Gate
talents.description: Vector Targeting. Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 (+4% per level) damage per second and are slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

talents.name: ProbiusPowerOverflowingWarpInPylon
talents.title: Power Overflowing
talents.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 10% increased Spell Power and 2 Mana per second.

talents.name: ProbiusQuantumEntanglementWarpRift
talents.title: Quantum Entanglement
talents.description: Enemies continue to be slowed for 3 seconds after their last contact with a Warp Rift.

talents.name: ProbiusGateKeeperNullGate
talents.title: Gate Keeper
talents.description: Null Gate lasts indefinitely if either end is within a Power Field.  Only one Null Gate may be active at a time.

talents.name: ProbiusTurboChargedWorkerRush
talents.title: Turbo Charged
talents.description: Worker Rush grants an additional 10% passive Movement Speed while in a Power Field, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

talents.name: ProbiusAggressiveMatrixWarpInPylon
talents.title: Aggressive Matrix
talents.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 35% increased Attack Damage.

talents.name: ProbiusWarpResonanceWarpRiftQuest
talents.title: Warp Resonance
talents.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Warp Rift explosions.  Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, increase the explosion damage by 100.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, Warp Rift gains 1 additional charge.

talents.name: ProbiusRiftShockWarpRift
talents.title: Rift Shock
talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Warp Rift explosion increases Probius's damage against them by 20% for 10 seconds.

talents.name: ProbiusPhotonBarrierPhotonCannon
talents.title: Photon Barrier
talents.description: While a Photon Cannon is alive and powered, Probius gains 30 Spell Armor.

talents.name: ProbiusRepulsorWarpRift
talents.title: Repulsor
talents.description: Enemies hit by a Warp Rift explosion are knocked away from the center.

talents.name: ProbiusInterferenceWarpRift
talents.title: Interference
talents.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Warp Rift detonations have their Spell Power reduced by 35% for 5 seconds.

talents.name: ProbiusShootEmUptoRiftsDisruptionPulse
talents.title: Shoot 'Em Up
talents.description: Hitting a Warp Rift with Disruption Pulse causes 4 additional pulses that deal 50% damage to be fired from the impact location in different directions.  Additional Pulses do not benefit from Echo Pulse or Particle Accelerator.

talents.name: ProbiusProbiusLoopWarpRift
talents.title: Probius Loop
talents.description: Whenever a Rift explosion hits 2 or more enemy Heroes, create a new Warp Rift in the same location.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Empower Sulfuras
abilities.description: Ragnaros's next Basic Attack is instant, dealing 191 (+4% per level) Ability damage in an area, and heals for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing doubled versus Heroes.  Molten Core: Molten Swing - Stun and damage nearby enemies.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Living Meteor
abilities.description: Summon a meteor at the target point that deals 68 (+4% per level) damage, then rolls in that target direction dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage per second for 1.75 seconds.  Molten Core: Meteor Shower - Drop a line of meteor impacts.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Blast Wave
abilities.description: Ignite Ragnaros or an ally, granting 25% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds before exploding dealing 104 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Molten Core: Explosive Rune - Cause a delayed explosion in a large area.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Sulfuras Smash
abilities.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Lava Wave
abilities.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Molten Core
abilities.description: Channel on an allied or destroyed Fort or Keep to replace it with Ragnaros's ultimate form, temporarily gaining new Abilities, having 3996 (+4% per level) Health that burns away over 18 seconds.  Ragnaros returns to his normal form upon losing all Health in Molten Core.

talents.name: RagnarosLivingMeteorShiftingMeteor
talents.title: Shifting Meteor
talents.description: Each time an enemy is hit by the same Living Meteor, they take 3% increased damage from it. Quest: Hit 75 Heroes with Living Meteor.  Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes with Living Meteor, its duration is increased to 2.25 seconds, and the Ability can be recast to change its direction once per cast.

talents.name: RagnarosBlastWaveSlowBurn
talents.title: Slow Burn
talents.description: Blast Wave slows enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.

talents.name: RagnarosLivingMeteorMoltenPower
talents.title: Molten Power
talents.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Living Meteor increases the damage of the next Living Meteor by 20%, up to a maximum of 100%.

talents.name: RagnarosLavaWave
talents.title: Lava Wave
talents.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

talents.name: RagnarosEmpowerSulfurasCauterizeWounds
talents.title: Cauterize Wounds
talents.description: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 40% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.

talents.name: RagnarosLivingMeteorMeteorBomb
talents.title: Meteor Bomb
talents.description: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 220 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

talents.name: RagnarosEmpowerSulfurasSulfurasHungers
talents.title: Sulfuras Hungers
talents.description: Quest: Every time you kill a Minion with Empower Sulfuras, its damage is increased by 1, up to 30.  Reward: After killing 30 Minions, increase its damage by an additional 90.

talents.name: RagnarosCatchingFire
talents.title: Catching Fire
talents.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Ragnaros' Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 18.75. Reward: After gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, activate Catching Fire to gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

talents.name: RagnarosEmpowerSulfurasHandOfRagnaros
talents.title: Hand of Ragnaros
talents.description: If Empower Sulfuras hits at least 2 enemy Heroes, it restores 10 Mana and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

talents.name: RagnarosResilientFlame
talents.title: Resilient Flame
talents.description: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

talents.name: RagnarosEmpowerSulfurasGiantScorcher
talents.title: Giant Scorcher
talents.description: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.

talents.name: RagnarosSubmerge
talents.title: Submerge
talents.description: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for 600 Health over 3 seconds.

talents.name: RagnarosLivingMeteorFireWard
talents.title: Fire Ward
talents.description: When Living Meteor hits an enemy Hero, gain a charge of Spell Block, reducing damage from the next enemy ability by 50%. Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: RagnarosLavaWaveLavaSurge
talents.title: Lava Surge
talents.description: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

talents.name: RagnarosSulfurasSmash
talents.title: Sulfuras Smash
talents.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

talents.name: RagnarosBlisteringAttacks
talents.title: Blistering Attacks

abilities.name: Q1

talents.name: StukovHeroicAbilityFlailingSwipe
