abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Oracle
abilities.description: Activate to greatly increase Tassadar's vision radius, allow him to see over obstacles, and detect stealthed units. Lasts for 5 seconds. Passive: Tassadar's Basic Attack is a Distortion Beam that slows enemy units by 20%.

talents.name: TassadarTemplarsWill
talents.title: Templar's Will
talents.description: Quest: Attacking enemy Heroes restores 8 mana per second. Reward: After spending 30 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's damage is increased by 125%. Reward: After spending 60 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's range is increased by an additional 1.

talents.name: TassadarKhalasEmbrace
talents.title: Khala's Embrace
talents.description: Increase the Life Steal of Plasma Shield to 75%.

talents.name: TassadarMasteryMentalAcuity
talents.title: Mental Acuity
talents.description: Quest: Each Takedown earned lowers the cooldown of Oracle by 3 seconds, to a maximum of 15 seconds. Reward: Upon getting 5 Takedowns, the sight range of Oracle is increased by 50%.

talents.name: TassadarHeroicAbilityArchon
talents.title: Archon
talents.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 175 (+4% per level) damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 88 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds. Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

talents.name: TassadarAdunsWisdom
talents.title: Adun's Wisdom
talents.description: While Oracle is active, Basic Abilities cooldown 50% faster.

talents.name: TassadarPsionicStormPsiInfusion
talents.title: Psi-Infusion
talents.description: Quest: Gain 1 Mana for every Non-Structure enemy hit by Psionic Storm. Reward: After hitting 500 enemies, increase the size of Psionic Storm by 20%. Reward: After hitting 1000 enemies, increase the damage of Psionic Storm by 20%.

talents.name: TassadarPsionicProjection
talents.title: Psionic Projection
talents.description: Increases the cast range of Plasma Shield and Psionic Storm by 40%.

talents.name: TassadarDeepShift
talents.title: Deep Shift
talents.description: Dimensional Shift's duration and Movement Speed bonuses are increased by 50%.

talents.name: TassadarPsionicEcho
talents.title: Psionic Echo
talents.description: A second Psionic Storm can be cast within 2 seconds of casting the first.

talents.name: TassadarKhaydarinResonance
talents.title: Khaydarin Resonance
talents.description: Quest: Regeneration Globes grant an additional 100% Mana.  Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 20%. Reward: After collecting 30 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 40%.

talents.name: TassadarKhalasLight
talents.title: Khala's Light
talents.description: Upon expiration or breaking, the target of Plasma Shield gains 15 Armor for 3 seconds, causing them to take 15% less damage.

talents.name: TassadarPhaseDisruption
talents.title: Phase Disruption
talents.description: Enemy Heroes being hit by Psionic Storm have their Physical Armor reduced by 25, causing them to take 25% more damage from Basic Attacks.

talents.name: TassadarFocusedBeam
talents.title: Focused Beam
talents.description: While Oracle is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 1% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

talents.name: TassadarKhalasCelerityPlasmaShield
talents.title: Khala's Celerity
talents.description: Plasma Shield also grants 20% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

talents.name: TassadarHeroicAbilityForceWall
talents.title: Force Wall
talents.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.  Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.

talents.name: TassadarNullification
talents.title: Nullification
talents.description: Activate to reduce the damage the target enemy Hero deals by 75% for 4 seconds.

talents.name: TassadarPrismaticLink
talents.title: Prismatic Link
talents.description: Basic Attacks bounce to hit 2 additional targets for 50% damage.

talents.name: TassadarResonation
talents.title: Resonation
talents.description: Distortion Beam slows enemies affected by Psionic Storm by 50%.

talents.name: TassadarMasteryForceBarrier
talents.title: Force Barrier
talents.description: Force Wall's Range is increased by 100% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

talents.name: TassadarMasteryTwilightArchon
talents.title: Twilight Archon
talents.description: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by 2 seconds.

talents.name: TassadarShieldBattery
talents.title: Shield Battery
talents.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes an untalented Plasma Shield.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Hamstring
abilities.description: Deal 110 (+4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.  Your next Basic Attack will strike immediately.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Butcher's Brand
abilities.description: Deal 37 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and cause your Basic Attacks against them to heal you for 75% of the damage done. Healing doubled versus Heroes. Lasts 4 seconds. Your Basic Attacks against a branded Hero increase the duration by 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Ruthless Onslaught
abilities.description: Charge at an enemy, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed. If you reach the target, they are stunned for 1 second and take 119 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Lamb to the Slaughter
abilities.description: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 (+4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Furnace Blast
abilities.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 (+4% per level) damage to enemies. Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Fresh Meat
abilities.description: Upon dying, nearby Minions drop 1 Fresh Meat and enemy Heroes drop 20 Fresh Meat. Fresh Meat can be picked up to gain 0.5 Attack Damage per Meat. The Butcher loses 15 Fresh Meat upon dying. Quest: Collect 200 Fresh Meat. Reward: Gain an additional 125 Attack Damage and 25% increased Attack Speed. Heroes continue to drop 10 Fresh Meat, Minions no longer drop Fresh Meat, and Fresh Meat is no longer lost on death.

talents.name: ButcherMasteryHamstringInvigoration
talents.title: Invigoration
talents.description: If Hamstring hits a Hero, half of the Mana cost is refunded and the cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

talents.name: ButcherMasteryRuthlessOnslaughtUnrelentingPursuit
talents.title: Unrelenting Pursuit
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by 33% upon impact.

talents.name: ButcherMeatShield
talents.title: Meat Shield
talents.description: When Ruthless Onslaught impacts an enemy Hero, The Butcher gains 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 50%.

talents.name: ButcherHeroicAbilityLambToTheSlaughter
talents.title: Lamb to the Slaughter
talents.description: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 (+4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

talents.name: ButcherMasteryRuthlessOnslaughtSavageCharge
talents.title: Savage Charge
talents.description: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

talents.name: ButcherTalentEnraged
talents.title: Enraged
talents.description: Receiving damage that reduces The Butcher below 50% of his maximum Health causes him to become Enraged for 10 seconds, gaining 40% Attack Speed and 15 Armor, reducing damage taken by 15%.

talents.name: GenericTalentBlock
talents.title: Block
talents.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: GenericTalentFlashoftheStorms
talents.title: Bolt of the Storm
talents.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

talents.name: ButcherMasteryButchersBrandInsatiableBlade
talents.title: Insatiable Blade
talents.description: While facing the branded enemy, The Butcher's Movement Speed is increased by 25%.

talents.name: GenericTalentNexusBlades
talents.title: Nexus Blades
talents.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

talents.name: ButcherMasteryHamstringCheapShot
talents.title: Cheap Shot
talents.description: Hamstring does 100% more damage to targets affected by a Slow, Root, or Stun.

talents.name: ButcherMasteryHamstringBrutalStrike
talents.title: Brutal Strike
talents.description: After using Hamstring, The Butcher's next 3 Basic Attacks within 5 seconds deal an additional 15% damage.

talents.name: ButcherMasteryHamstringChopMeat
talents.title: Chop Meat
talents.description: Increases Hamstring damage by 100% to Minions and Mercenaries.

talents.name: ButcherMasteryHamstringFlailAxe
talents.title: Flail Axe
talents.description: Increases the length of Hamstring by 40%.

talents.name: ButcherMasteryHamstringCripplingSlam
talents.title: Crippling Slam
talents.description: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by 30%.

talents.name: ButcherCleaver
talents.title: Cleaver
talents.description: Basic Attacks deal 35% of The Butcher's Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

talents.name: ButcherHeroicAbilityButcherFurnaceBlast
talents.title: Furnace Blast
talents.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 (+4% per level) damage to enemies. Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

talents.name: ButcherMasteryFreshMeatBloodFrenzy
talents.title: Blood Frenzy
talents.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5% increased Attack and Movement Speed for 3 seconds, up to 25%.

talents.name: ButcherMasterySlaughterhouse
talents.title: Slaughterhouse
talents.description: Lamb to the Slaughter now chains all enemy Heroes in range.

talents.name: ButcherMasteryFiresofHell
talents.title: Fires of Hell
talents.description: Furnace Blast explodes a second time 3 seconds after the initial explosion.

talents.name: ButcherMasteryFreshMeatVictuals
talents.title: Victuals
talents.description: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, The Butcher heals 5% of his maximum health.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Spin To Win!
abilities.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Nordic Attack Squad
abilities.description: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Viking Bribery
abilities.description: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant you stacks of Viking Bribery. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.  Current number of Viking Bribery stacks: 0

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Play Again!
abilities.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.   Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Longboat Raid!
abilities.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Viking Hoard
abilities.description: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second.  Current Bonus: 1 Regen per second

abilities.name: Z1
abilities.title: Go Go Go!
abilities.description: The Vikings gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

abilities.title: Select Olaf
abilities.description: Olaf can charge enemies and slow their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds by right-clicking on them. 8 second cooldown.  Olaf gains increased Health Regeneration when out of combat for 4 seconds.

abilities.title: Select Baleog
abilities.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks deal 50% splash damage to enemies behind his attack target.

abilities.title: Select Erik
abilities.description: Erik moves faster than the other Vikings and has increased Basic Attack range.

abilities.title: Select All Vikings
abilities.description: The Lost Vikings can be controlled individually or as a group. Each Viking has particular strengths.

talents.name: LostVikingsMasterySpyGames
talents.title: Spy Games
talents.description: After standing still for 3 seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by 75%. The Stealth persists for 3 seconds after moving.

talents.name: GenericTalentMercenaryLord
talents.title: Mercenary Lord
talents.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

talents.name: LostVikingsMasterySpinToWin
talents.title: Spin To Win!
talents.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

talents.name: LostVikingsHeroicAbilityPlayAgain
talents.title: Play Again!
talents.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.  Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

talents.name: LostVikingsMasteryJump
talents.title: Jump!
talents.description: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: LostVikingsMasteryLargeAndInCharge
talents.title: Large and In Charge
talents.description: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.

talents.name: HeroGenericExecutionerPassive
talents.title: Executioner
talents.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: LostVikingsMasteryOlafTheStout
talents.title: Olaf the Stout
talents.description: Every 5 seconds, Olaf gains 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: LostVikingsMasteryPainDontHurt
talents.title: Pain Don't Hurt
talents.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

talents.name: LostVikingsMasteryNordicAttackSquad
talents.title: Nordic Attack Squad
talents.description: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

talents.name: LostVikingsMasteryImpatienceIsAVirtue
talents.title: Impatience Is a Virtue
talents.description: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.25 seconds.

talents.name: LostVikingsMasteryExplosiveAttacks
talents.title: Explosive Attacks
talents.description: Increases Baleog's splash damage against non-Heroes to 100%.

talents.name: LostVikingsMasteryBaleogTheFierce
talents.title: Baleog the Fierce
talents.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks increase his Attack Speed by 8%, stacking up to 5 times. After 3 seconds of not attacking, these stacks will rapidly decay.

talents.name: LostVikingsMasteryTheSequel
talents.title: The Sequel!
talents.description: Reduces the Lost Vikings' death timer by 50%.

talents.name: LostVikingsMasteryVikingBribery
talents.title: Viking Bribery
talents.description: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant you stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster. Current number of Bribe stacks: 0

talents.name: LostVikingsMasteryErikTheSwift
talents.title: Erik the Swift
talents.description: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 34 (+4% per level) Health per second.

talents.name: LostVikingsMasteryCheckpointReached
talents.title: Checkpoint Reached
talents.description: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

talents.name: LostVikingsMasteryNorseForce
talents.title: Norse Force!
talents.description: All Vikings gain a 110 (+4% per level) to 220 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

talents.name: LostVikingsHeroicAbilityLongboatRaid
talents.title: Longboat Raid!
talents.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

talents.name: LostVikingsGoGoGo64KBMarathon
talents.title: 64 KB Marathon
talents.description: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds.  Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.

talents.name: LostVikingsMasteryHunkaBurningOlaf
talents.title: Hunka' Burning Olaf
talents.description: Olaf deals 34 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies.

talents.name: LostVikingsTalentFuryoftheStorm
talents.title: Fury of the Storm
talents.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 41 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 105 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions and Mercenaries.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.

talents.name: LostVikingsMasteryItsASabotage
talents.title: It's a Sabotage!
talents.description: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures light them on fire for 10 seconds, causing 135 (+4% per level) damage and destroying 5 Ammo.

talents.name: LostVikingsMasteryWereOnABoat
talents.title: Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
talents.description: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Chain Lightning
abilities.description: Shock an enemy with lightning, dealing 178 (+4% per level) damage. The lightning then bounces 3 times to nearby enemies, dealing 89 (+4% per level) damage to each enemy hit.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Feral Spirit
abilities.description: Unleash a Feral Spirit that deals 153 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path and Roots Heroes hit for 1 second. Each Hero hit increases the distance traveled by 25%.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Windfury
abilities.description: Increase your Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. Your next 3 Basic Attacks occur 100% faster.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Sundering
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, stunning them for 1 seconds.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Earthquake
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Frostwolf Resilience
abilities.description: Dealing damage with Abilities grants 1 stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At 5 stacks, Thrall is instantly healed for 223 (+4% per level) Health.

talents.name: GenericTalentFollowThrough
talents.title: Follow Through
talents.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

talents.name: ThrallEchooftheElements
talents.title: Echo of the Elements
talents.description: Quest: Kill Minions or Heroes within 1.5 seconds of hitting them with Chain Lightning. Reward: After killing 10 enemies, reduce the Mana cost of Chain Lightning from 45 to 25. Reward: After killing 20 enemies, gain a second charge of Chain Lightning.

talents.name: ThrallMasteryManaTide
talents.title: Mana Tide
talents.description: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

talents.name: ThrallHeroicAbilitySundering
talents.title: Sundering
talents.description: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, stunning them for 1 seconds.

talents.name: ThrallMasteryFrostwolfsGrace
talents.title: Frostwolf's Grace
talents.description: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantly heal for 150% of its normal amount.

talents.name: ThrallMasteryTempestFury
talents.title: Tempest Fury
talents.description: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

talents.name: ThrallMaelstromWeapon
talents.title: Maelstrom Weapon
talents.description: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1. Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%. Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.

talents.name: ThrallHeroicAbilityEarthquake
talents.title: Earthquake
talents.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

talents.name: GenericTalentNexusBlades
talents.title: Nexus Blades
talents.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

talents.name: ThrallAncestralWrath
talents.title: Ancestral Wrath
talents.description: Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt. Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.

talents.name: ThrallWindRush
talents.title: Wind Rush
talents.description: Activate to immediately teleport to a target location and gain Windfury.

talents.name: ThrallFrostwolfPack
talents.title: Frostwolf Pack
talents.description: Quest: Hit 7 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero. Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.

talents.name: ThrallMasteryGraceOfAir
talents.title: Grace Of Air
talents.description: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

talents.name: ThrallMasteryRollingThunder
talents.title: Rolling Thunder
talents.description: For 10 seconds after hitting an enemy with Chain Lightning, Thrall's next Basic Attack against them restores 15 Mana. Passive: Increase the range of Chain Lightning by 30% and the number of bounces by 1.

talents.name: ThrallThunderstorm
talents.title: Thunderstorm
talents.description: Casting Chain Lightning on a Hero other than the last Hero it was cast on causes it to Slow targets by 8% for 2 seconds.  Repeatable Quest: Each consecutive cast against a new Hero increases this bonus by 8%, up to 40%. Bonuses are reset if Thrall dies or casts Chain Lightning on the same Hero twice.  Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.

talents.name: ThrallCrashLightning
talents.title: Crash Lightning
talents.description: Repeatable Quest: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single use of Chain Lightning increases the damage of its bounces by 12, up to 480. Reward: After hitting multiple Heroes 20 times, Chain Lightning prioritizes bouncing to Heroes.

talents.name: ThrallAlphaWolf
talents.title: Alpha Wolf
talents.description: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage.Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: ThrallFeralResilience
talents.title: Feral Resilience
talents.description: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience and 2 stacks of Feral Resilience, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack.  Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.

talents.name: ThrallSpiritShield
talents.title: Spirit Shield
talents.description: Every 45 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds. Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by 8 seconds.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

talents.name: ThrallMasteryEarthenShields
talents.title: Earthen Shields
talents.description: Allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of their maximum Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

talents.name: ThrallMasteryWorldbreaker
talents.title: Worldbreaker
talents.description: Lower the cooldown of Sundering by 20 seconds. After Sundering impacts, it leaves behind an impassable rift, blocking unit movement for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Blink
abilities.description: Dash towards an area. Stores 3 charges.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Melee
abilities.description: Deal 254 (+4% per level) damage to a nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes. Gain 5% Pulse Bomb charge when using Melee against an enemy, and 10% against Heroes.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Recall
abilities.description: Return to the position you were at 3 seconds ago, refill your ammo, and remove all negative status effects from yourself.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Pulse Bomb
abilities.description: Fire a short range bomb that attaches to enemy units if you hit them. The bomb explodes after 2 seconds dealing 420 (+5.5% per level) damage to them and 210 (+5.5% per level) damage to other nearby enemies.  This Ability is slowly charged over time by dealing damage to enemies with Basic Attacks and Melee.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Reload
abilities.description: You can Basic Attack while moving, and after attacking 10 times you need to reload over 0.75 seconds. You can manually reload early by activating Reload.

talents.name: TracerPulseStrikeMelee
talents.title: Pulse Strike
talents.description: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge from 10% to 20% against Heroes.

talents.name: TracerPartingGift
talents.title: Parting Gift
talents.description: Recall leaves behind 3 bombs that deal 240 (+4% per level) damage each to different targets.

talents.name: TracerJumper
talents.title: Jumper
talents.description: Increases Blink's charges by 1.

talents.name: TracerQuantumSpike
talents.title: Quantum Spike
talents.description: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 10% of the primary target's maximum Health.

talents.name: TracerBulletSprayMelee
talents.title: Bullet Spray
talents.description: Increases Melee's radius by 40%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.

talents.name: TracerSleightofHand
talents.title: Sleight of Hand
talents.description: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.

talents.name: TracerSlipstreamRecall
talents.title: Slipstream
talents.description: Increases the amount of time Recalled by 1 second.

talents.name: TracerUntouchable
talents.title: Untouchable
talents.description: Quest: Takedowns increase your Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.

talents.name: TracerBulletTime
talents.title: Bullet Time
talents.description: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Blink by 0.1 seconds.

talents.name: TracerLeechingRounds
talents.title: Leeching Rounds
talents.description: Your Basic Attacks against Heroes heal you for 20% of their damage dealt.

talents.name: TracerCompositionBPulseBomb
talents.title: Composition B
talents.description: If you successfully stick a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero, you also drop another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.

talents.name: TracerTracerRounds
talents.title: Tracer Rounds
talents.description: Your Basic Attacks reveal enemies for 4 seconds.

talents.name: TracerPulseRounds
talents.title: Pulse Rounds
talents.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.

talents.name: TracerRicochetHeroWeapon
talents.title: Ricochet
talents.description: Your Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.

talents.name: TracerGetStuffedMelee
talents.title: Get Stuffed!
talents.description: Reduces Melee's cooldown by 3 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knocks the target away from you.

talents.name: TracerTotalRecallRecall
talents.title: Total Recall
talents.description: Recall's cooldown is increased by 8 seconds, but it heals you equal to the amount of Health you lost during that time.

talents.name: TracerStickyBomb
talents.title: Sticky Bomb
talents.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: TracerFocusFire
talents.title: Focus Fire
talents.description: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 94.5 (+4% per level) bonus damage.  This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.

talents.name: TracerSpatialEcho
talents.title: Spatial Echo
talents.description: Hero Takedowns grant 2 charges of Blink.

talents.name: TracerLockedandLoaded
talents.title: Locked and Loaded
talents.description: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase your Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.

talents.name: TracerIsthataHealthPack
talents.title: Is That a Health Pack?!
talents.description: Increases Regeneration Globe and Healing Fountain healing by 100%.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Overkill
abilities.description: Deal 645 (+4% per level) damage to the target and 315 (+4% per level) damage to nearby targets over 4 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target.  Can move and use Abilities while channeling.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Frag Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 256 (+4% per level) damage, knocking enemies away.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Run and Gun
abilities.description: Dash a short distance.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Drakken Laser Drill
abilities.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Commandeer Odin
abilities.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Minigun
abilities.description: Activate to have your Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of their maximum Health. Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Q2
abilities.title: Annihilate
abilities.description: Fire the Odin's cannons in a straight line, dealing 196 (+4% per level) damage to everything in the path.

abilities.name: W2
abilities.title: Ragnarok Missiles
abilities.description: Launches a missile at each nearby enemy, dealing 141 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: E2
abilities.title: Thrusters
abilities.description: Dash in target direction.

talents.name: TychusMasteryRunandGunDash
talents.title: Dash
talents.description: Quest: Run and Gun increases your Movement Speed by 1% for each Regeneration Globe you gather, up to 25%. Lasts 2 seconds.  Reward: Once you have gathered 25 Regeneration Globes, also increase the range of Run and Gun by 50%.

talents.name: TychusTheBiggerTheyAre
talents.title: The Bigger They Are...
talents.description: Increases Minigun damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 35% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 35%.

talents.name: TychusMasteryQuarterback
talents.title: Quarterback
talents.description: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%.

talents.name: TychusHeroicAbilityCommandeerOdin
talents.title: Commandeer Odin
talents.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 60% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

talents.name: TychusNeosteelCoating
talents.title: Neosteel Coating
talents.description: Activate to gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.

talents.name: TychusMasteryOverkillArmorPiercingRounds
talents.title: Armor Piercing Rounds
talents.description: Increases Overkill's damage to the primary target by 50%.

talents.name: TychusSizzlinAttacks
talents.title: Sizzlin' Attacks
talents.description: Your Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun.

talents.name: TychusPressTheAdvantage
talents.title: Press the Advantage
talents.description: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5 for 3 seconds.

talents.name: TychusInTheRhythm
talents.title: In the Rhythm
talents.description: Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by 0.03 seconds.

talents.name: TychusMasteryFragGrenadeConcussionGrenade
talents.title: Concussion Grenade
talents.description: Increases Frag Grenade's radius by 25% and the knockback distance by 100%.

talents.name: TychusThatsTheStuff
talents.title: That's the Stuff!
talents.description: Minigun heals Tychus for 100% of the bonus damage dealt after it expires.

talents.name: TychusMasteryFragGrenadeTitanGrenade
talents.title: Titan Grenade
talents.description: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health.

talents.name: TychusHeroicAbilityDrakkenLaserDrill
talents.title: Drakken Laser Drill
talents.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

talents.name: TychusMasteryLeadRain
talents.title: Lead Rain
talents.description: Overkill also slows enemy movement speed by 20%.

talents.name: TychusMasterAssassin
talents.title: Master Assassin
talents.description: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase your Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%.  Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, your Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.

talents.name: TychusMasterySprayNPray
talents.title: Spray 'n' Pray
talents.description: Increases Overkill's range by 25%.

talents.name: TychusMasteryDrakkenLaserFocusingDiodes
talents.title: Focusing Diodes
talents.description: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increasing damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.

talents.name: TychusMasteryOdinBigRedButton
talents.title: Big Red Button
talents.description: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile which lands 2.5 seconds later.

talents.name: TychusRelentlessSoldier
talents.title: Relentless Soldier
talents.description: Being Stunned or Rooted grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

talents.name: TychusCombatTactician
talents.title: Combat Tactician
talents.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Run and Gun by 0.8 seconds.

talents.name: TychusFullyLoaded
talents.title: Fully Loaded
talents.description: Reduce Minigun's cooldown by 41%.

talents.name: TychusRunAndGunBobAndWeave
talents.title: Bob and Weave
talents.description: Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: El'Druin's Might
abilities.description: Deals 110 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within target area, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Reactivating will teleport you to the blade and slow nearby enemies again.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Righteousness
abilities.description: Shields you for 336 (+4% per level) damage and nearby allies for 135 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Smite
abilities.description: Rake target area for 144 (+4% per level) damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Judgment
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Sanctification
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Archangel's Wrath
abilities.description: When you die, become invulnerable and explode for 550 (+4% per level) damage after 3.5 seconds.

talents.name: GenericTalentRegenerationMaster
talents.title: Regeneration Master
talents.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30.  Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

talents.name: GenericVigorousStrikePassive
talents.title: Vigorous Strike
talents.description: Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

talents.name: TyraelMasteryZealotry
talents.title: Zealotry
talents.description: Increases the duration of Righteousness by 50%, and reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds.

talents.name: TyraelHeroicAbilitySanctification
talents.title: Sanctification
talents.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

talents.name: TyraelMasteryAngelicAbsorption
talents.title: Angelic Absorption
talents.description: Enemies that attack you while shielded grant 240 (+4% per level) Health over 4 seconds.

talents.name: TyraelMasterySalvation
talents.title: Salvation
talents.description: Each allied Hero that is affected by Righteousness increases Tyrael's Shield amount by 45%.

talents.name: GenericTalentBurningRage
talents.title: Burning Rage
talents.description: Deal 23 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

talents.name: GenericTalentFollowThrough
talents.title: Follow Through
talents.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

talents.name: TyraelMasteryPurgeEvil
talents.title: Purge Evil
talents.description: Smite deals 30% more damage to Heroes.

talents.name: TyraelHeroicAbilityJudgement
talents.title: Judgment
talents.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 50 (+4% per level) damage.

talents.name: GenericTalentNexusBlades
talents.title: Nexus Blades
talents.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

talents.name: TyraelMasterySwiftRetribution
talents.title: Swift Retribution
talents.description: Increases Smite's Movement Speed by 10% and duration by 1 second.

talents.name: TyraelMasteryHolyGround
talents.title: Holy Ground
talents.description: Create a ring that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'druin's Might.

talents.name: TyraelMasteryElDruinsMightHoradricReforging
talents.title: Horadric Reforging
talents.description: If El'druin's Might hits an enemy, its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

talents.name: TyraelMasteryRighteousnessReciprocate
talents.title: Reciprocate
talents.description: When your shield expires, it explodes for 170 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

talents.name: TyraelMasterySanctificationHolyArena
talents.title: Holy Arena
talents.description: Increases duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increases the damage of allies by 25%.

talents.name: TyraelMasteryPassiveProtectioninDeath
talents.title: Protection in Death
talents.description: When Archangel's Wrath explodes, shield nearby allies for 50% of their max Health for 10 seconds.

talents.name: TyraelMasteryEvenInDeath
talents.title: Even In Death
talents.description: Increases Archangel's Wrath's damage by 25%. Basic Abilities also can be used before exploding, but deal no damage.

talents.name: TyraelMasteryElDruinsMightAngelsGrace
talents.title: Angel's Grace
talents.description: After teleporting using El'druin's Might, gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

talents.name: TyraelMasteryAngelicMight
talents.title: Angelic Might
talents.description: Gain 80% increased damage on your next Basic Attack for each Hero hit by Smite.

talents.name: TyraelMasteryElDruinsMightBladeOfJustice
talents.title: Blade of Justice
talents.description: After teleporting using El'druin's Might, increase your Attack Speed by 50% for 5 seconds.

talents.name: GenericTalentBloodForBlood
talents.title: Blood for Blood
talents.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.

talents.name: TyraelMasteryJudgmentAngelofJustice
talents.title: Angel of Justice
talents.description: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.

talents.name: GenericTalentNullificationShield
talents.title: Nullification Shield
talents.description: Activate to gain 60 Spell Armor for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Light of Elune
abilities.description: Heal target ally for 270 (+4% per level) Health. Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of this Ability by 2 seconds.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Sentinel
abilities.description: Send an Owl that travels across the battleground revealing its path. Deals 173 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and reveals them for 5 seconds.  Repeatable Quest:  Every 8 Heroes hit by Sentinel decrease its Mana cost by 10 and cause it to pierce an additional target.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Lunar Flare
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, deal 205 (+4% per level) damage and stun enemies in the target area for 0.75 seconds.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Shadowstalk
abilities.description: Stealth and gain 30% Movement Speed. When Shadowstalk's Stealth is broken, gain 50% Attack Speed and retain its Movement Speed bonus for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Starfall
abilities.description: Deal 91 (+4% per level) damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Hunter's Mark
abilities.description: Reveal a target enemy and lower their Armor by 25 for 4 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%.  Cannot be used on Structures.

talents.name: TyrandeMasteryLunarBlaze
talents.title: Lunar Blaze
talents.description: Repeatable Quest: Hitting Heroes with Lunar Flare increases its damage by 3%.  Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Lunar Flare no longer has a Mana cost.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase the range of Lunar Flare by 40%.

talents.name: TyrandeKaldoreiResistance
talents.title: Kaldorei Resistance
talents.description: Light of Elune grants the target 15 Spell Armor for 6 seconds. This effect stacks up to 3 times.

talents.name: TyrandeDarnassianArchery
talents.title: Darnassian Archery
talents.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant a stacking 5% increased Attack Damage bonus for 4 seconds. This bonus is lost when Basic Attacking non-Heroes.

talents.name: TyrandeHeroicAbilityShadowstalk
talents.title: Shadowstalk
talents.description: Stealth and gain 30% Movement Speed. When Shadowstalk's Stealth is broken, gain 50% Attack Speed and retain its Movement Speed bonus for 5 seconds.

talents.name: TyrandeHarshMoonlight
talents.title: Harsh Moonlight
talents.description: Sentinel Slows the target by 25% and reduces their damage dealt by 25% for 4 seconds.

talents.name: TyrandeMarkofMending
talents.title: Mark of Mending
talents.description: Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal her for 2% of her maximum Health. Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark heal the attacker for 2% of their maximum Health.

talents.name: TyrandeShootingStar
talents.title: Shooting Star
talents.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Every 10th Basic Attack against Heroes casts a free Lunar Flare at a random Hero near Tyrande's position.

talents.name: TyrandeTrueshotAura
talents.title: Trueshot Aura
talents.description: Passively grant 10% increased Attack Damage to nearby allied Heroes. Activate to double this bonus for 5 seconds.

talents.name: TyrandeMoonlitArrows
talents.title: Moonlit Arrows
talents.description: Basic Attacks decrease the cooldown of Light of Elune by an additional 0.75 seconds.

talents.name: TyrandeMasteryLightofEluneQuickeningBlessing
talents.title: Quickening Blessing
talents.description: Light of Elune increases the target's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: TyrandeOverflowingLight
talents.title: Overflowing Light
talents.description: While Tyrande is above 60% Health, Light of Elune's healing is increased by 30%.

talents.name: TyrandeRangersMark
talents.title: Ranger's Mark
talents.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 1 second.  Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase the duration of Hunter's Mark by 1 second.

talents.name: TyrandeIcebladeArrows
talents.title: Iceblade Arrows
talents.description: Increase Attack Speed by 25%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce their damage dealt by 5% for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 10 times.

talents.name: TyrandeHeroicAbilityStarfall
talents.title: Starfall
talents.description: Deal 91 (+4% per level) damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 8 seconds.

talents.name: TyrandeRanger
talents.title: Ranger
talents.description: Sentinel deals more damage based on the distance traveled, up to 75% and increases Sentinel width by 25%.  Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Sentinel increases the maximum damage bonus by 3%.

talents.name: TyrandeEmpower
talents.title: Empower
talents.description: Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by 2 seconds. Every time it hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by an additional 4 seconds.

talents.name: TyrandeCelestialAttunement
talents.title: Celestial Attunement
talents.description: Light of Elune removes Stuns and Silences from its target. When a Stun or Silence is removed this way, Light of Elune may be used for free within 4 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Celestial Attunement.

talents.name: TyrandeMasteryStarfallCelestialWrath
talents.title: Celestial Wrath
talents.description: Starfall applies Hunter's Mark to enemy Heroes hit.

talents.name: TyrandeEyesOfTheHuntress
talents.title: Eyes of the Huntress
talents.description: After casting Shadowstalk, reveal all enemy Heroes for 3 seconds.

talents.name: TyrandeHuntressFury
talents.title: Huntress' Fury
talents.description: Increase the cast range of Hunter's Mark by 50%. Tyrande's Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark splash to nearby Heroes and Mercenaries.

talents.name: TyrandeElunesChosen
talents.title: Elune's Chosen
talents.description: Activate to make Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal the target ally for 200% of the damage dealt. Lasts for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Holy Light
abilities.description: Heal target ally for 380 (+4% per level) Health. When used on a target other than Uther, also heal Uther for 190 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Holy Radiance
abilities.description: Heal all allies in a line for 185 (+4% per level) Health, dealing 185 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Hammer of Justice
abilities.description: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and stun the target for 0.75 seconds.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Divine Shield
abilities.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Divine Storm
abilities.description: Deal 187 (+4% per level) damage and stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Devotion
abilities.description: Heroes healed by Uther's Basic Abilities gain 15 Armor for 2 seconds. This effect does not stack with itself.

abilities.name: D2
abilities.title: Eternal Vanguard
abilities.description: Upon dying, Uther becomes an Invulnerable spirit for up to 8 seconds. While in spirit form, Uther can heal allies with Flash of Light.

abilities.name: Q2
abilities.title: Flash of Light
abilities.description: Heal an ally for 242 (+4% per level) Health.

talents.name: UtherHolyLightSilverTouch
talents.title: Silver Touch
talents.description: Quest: Reduce damage from Heroic sources with Devotion.  Reward: After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 90 to 70.  Reward: After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 50, and its range is increased by 50%.

talents.name: UtherMasteryHolyShock
talents.title: Holy Shock
talents.description: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 50% of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, and it refunds 45 Mana.

talents.name: UtherEternalDevotionArmorOfFaith
talents.title: Armor of Faith
talents.description: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge 200% faster for 6 seconds.

talents.name: UtherHeroicAbilityDivineStorm
talents.title: Divine Storm
talents.description: Deal 187 (+4% per level) damage and stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

talents.name: UtherHammerOfJusticeWellMet
talents.title: Well Met
talents.description: When used against Heroes, Hammer of Justice reduces the target's Movement Speed and damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: UtherBeaconOfLight
talents.title: Beacon of Light
talents.description: While below 50% Health, Uther receives 200% more self-healing when healing others with Holy Light.

talents.name: UtherMasteryWaveofLightHolyRadiance
talents.title: Wave of Light
talents.description: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance.  Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 seconds.  Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

talents.name: UtherHandOfProtection
talents.title: Hand of Protection
talents.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.

talents.name: UtherHeroicAbilityDivineShield
talents.title: Divine Shield
talents.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: UtherMasteryBlessedChampion
talents.title: Blessed Champion
talents.description: For the next 5 seconds after using Holy Light, Uther's Basic Attacks heal him and nearby allies for 15% of the total amount healed by Holy Light.

talents.name: UtherCombatStyleHammerOfTheLightbringer
talents.title: Hammer of the Lightbringer
talents.description: Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times.  Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.5 second.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.5% of Uther's maximum Mana.

talents.name: UtherHolyFire
talents.title: Holy Fire
talents.description: Deal 14 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.

talents.name: UtherMasteryBenediction
talents.title: Benediction
talents.description: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of your next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.

talents.name: GenericTalentSpellShield
talents.title: Spell Shield
talents.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

talents.name: UtherEternalDevotionGuardianOfAncientKings
talents.title: Guardian of Ancient Kings
talents.description: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Armor bonus they receive from Devotion from 25 to 50.

talents.name: UtherMasteryRedemption
talents.title: Redemption
talents.description: After Eternal Devotion ends, return to 50% of your maximum Health at your spirit's location. This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

talents.name: UtherHolyRadianceTyrsDeliverance
talents.title: Tyr's Deliverance
talents.description: Allies healed by Holy Radiance receive 40% increased healing from all sources for 6 seconds.

talents.name: UtherMasteryBulwarkOfLightDivineShield
talents.title: Bulwark of Light
talents.description: Divine Shield lasts 2 seconds longer and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

talents.name: UtherHammerOfJusticePursuitOfJustice
talents.title: Pursuit of Justice
talents.description: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: UtherMasteryDivineHurricaneDivineStorm
talents.title: Divine Hurricane
talents.description: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

talents.name: UtherEternalDevotionDivineProtection
talents.title: Divine Protection
talents.description: Devotion now stacks twice, and its duration is refreshed when applied.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Sinister Strike
abilities.description: Dash forward, hitting all enemies in a line for 110 (+4% per level) damage. If Sinister Strike hits a Hero, Valeera stops dashing immediately and the cooldown is reduced to 1 second. Awards 1 Combo Point.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Blade Flurry
abilities.description: Deal 130 (+4% per level) damage in an area around Valeera. Awards 1 Combo Point per enemy Hero hit.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Eviscerate
abilities.description: Eviscerate an enemy, dealing damage per Combo Point.  1 Point: 85 (+4% per level) 2 Points: 170 (+4% per level) 3 Points: 255 (+4% per level).

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Smoke Bomb
abilities.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Cloak of Shadows
abilities.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Vanish
abilities.description: Valeera vanishes from sight, becoming Stealthed and increasing her Movement Speed by 10%. For the first second, she is Unrevealable and can pass through other units.  Using Vanish grants Valeera an alternate set of Abilities that she can use while Stealthed.

abilities.name: Q2
abilities.title: Ambush
abilities.description: Ambush the target, instantly dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to the target.  Awards 1 Combo Point.

abilities.name: W2
abilities.title: Cheap Shot
abilities.description: Deal 30 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and stun them for 1.25 seconds.  Awards 1 Combo Point.

abilities.name: E2
abilities.title: Garrote
abilities.description: Garrote an enemy, dealing 20 (+4% per level) damage instantly, an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage over 7 seconds, and silencing them for 2.25 seconds.  Awards 1 Combo Point.

talents.name: ValeeraVigor
talents.title: Vigor
talents.description: Valeera regenerates an additional 2 Energy per second. Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

talents.name: ValeeraSinisterStrikeRelentlessStrikes
talents.title: Relentless Strikes
talents.description: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 10.

talents.name: ValeeraBladeFlurryFatalFinesse
talents.title: Fatal Finesse
talents.description: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 3, up to 60. Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.

talents.name: ValeeraCloakOfShadows
talents.title: Cloak of Shadows
talents.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

talents.name: ValeeraVanishElusiveness
talents.title: Elusiveness
talents.description: Increases Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 10%.

talents.name: ValeeraSinisterStrikeMutilate
talents.title: Mutilate
talents.description: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 100% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.

talents.name: ValeeraSmokeBomb
talents.title: Smoke Bomb
talents.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

talents.name: ValeeraSinisterStrikeSealFate
talents.title: Seal Fate
talents.description: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against silenced, rooted, or stunned enemy Heroes.

talents.name: ValeeraVanishSubtlety
talents.title: Subtlety
talents.description: After remaining Vanished for at least 4 seconds, using Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote causes Valeera to regenerate an additional 10 Energy per second for 5 seconds.

talents.name: ValeeraVanishInitiative
talents.title: Initiative
talents.description: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote award 1 Combo Points.

talents.name: ValeeraEviscerateSliceAndDice
talents.title: Slice and Dice
talents.description: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points causes Valeera's next 3 Basic Attacks to have their Attack Speed increased by 150%. Lasts 3 seconds.

talents.name: ValeeraCheapShotBlind
talents.title: Blind
talents.description: When Cheap Shot expires, the victim is blinded for 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: ValeeraEviscerateExposeArmor
talents.title: Expose Armor
talents.description: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points causes them to lose 25 Armor for 2 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%.

talents.name: ValeeraSmokeBombAdrenalineRush
talents.title: Adrenaline Rush
talents.description: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional 30 Energy per second.

talents.name: ValeeraAmbushAssassinate
talents.title: Assassinate
talents.description: Ambush deals 100% additional damage if no other enemy Heroes are within 4 range of the victim.

talents.name: ValeeraVanishNightslayer
talents.title: Nightslayer
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Vanish by 3 seconds.

talents.name: ValeeraAmbushDeathFromAbove
talents.title: Death From Above
talents.description: Ambush now has 6 range and teleports Valeera behind the victim.

talents.name: ValeeraThistleTea
talents.title: Thistle Tea
talents.description: Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy. Activating Thistle Tea does not break Vanish.

talents.name: ValeeraCripplingPoison
talents.title: Crippling Poison
talents.description: Activate to cause Valeera's next instance of Spell Damage to slow enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 5 seconds. Activating Crippling Poison does not break Vanish.

talents.name: ValeeraGarroteHemorrhage
talents.title: Hemorrhage
talents.description: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal 25% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.

talents.name: ValeeraGarroteRupture
talents.title: Rupture
talents.description: Valeera's Basic Attacks increase the damage over time effect of Garrote by 5%, stacking up to 30%, and refresh the duration.

talents.name: ValeeraWoundPoison
talents.title: Wound Poison
talents.description: Activate to cause Valeera's next instance of Spell Damage to also reduce healing received by the victim by 50% for 5 seconds. Activating Wound Poison does not break Vanish.

talents.name: ValeeraCombatReadiness
talents.title: Combat Readiness
talents.description: Each Combo Point spent grants 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 50%. Stores up to 3 charges.

talents.name: ValeeraGarroteStrangle
talents.title: Strangle
talents.description: Garrote reduces Ability Damage dealt by the victim by 25% for 7 seconds.

talents.name: ValeeraCloakOfShadowsEnvelopingShadows
talents.title: Enveloping Shadows
talents.description: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Hungering Arrow
abilities.description: Fire an arrow that deals 151 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies dealing 86 (+4% per level) damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Multishot
abilities.description: Deal 165 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Vault
abilities.description: Dash to the target area. Your next Basic Attack within 2 seconds deals 6% increased damage per stack of Hatred.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Rain of Vengeance
abilities.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds. Stores 2 charges.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Strafe
abilities.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Hatred
abilities.description: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 8% and Movement Speed by 1%. Lasts 6 seconds.

talents.name: DemonHunterCombatStyleHotPursuit
talents.title: Hot Pursuit
talents.description: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and you gain 4 Mana per second.

talents.name: DemonHunterCreedoftheHunter
talents.title: Creed of the Hunter
talents.description: Increases Attack Speed by 10%. Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes. Reward: Your Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.

talents.name: DemonHunterMasteryRepeatingArrowVault
talents.title: Repeating Arrow
talents.description: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.

talents.name: DemonHunterHeroicAbilityStrafe
talents.title: Strafe
talents.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

talents.name: DemonHunterMasterySiphoningArrow
talents.title: Siphoning Arrow
talents.description: You heal for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.

talents.name: DemonHunterManticore
talents.title: Manticore
talents.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

talents.name: DemonHunterMasteryPuncturingArrow
talents.title: Puncturing Arrow
talents.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100. Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.

talents.name: DemonHunterHeroicAbilityRainofVengeance
talents.title: Rain of Vengeance
talents.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds. Stores 2 charges.

talents.name: DemonHunterMasteryCaltrops
talents.title: Caltrops
talents.description: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 60 (+4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 25% for 1 second.  Quest: Spend 180 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred.  Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

talents.name: DemonHunterDeathDealer
talents.title: Death Dealer
talents.description: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.

talents.name: DemonHunterCombatStyleTemperedByDiscipline
talents.title: Tempered by Discipline
talents.description: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, your Basic Attacks heal you for 25% of the damage dealt.

talents.name: DemonHunterFarflightQuiver
talents.title: Farflight Quiver
talents.description: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by 2.2.

talents.name: DemonHunterPunishment
talents.title: Punishment
talents.description: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by 4%.

talents.name: DemonHunterMasteryArsenal
talents.title: Arsenal
talents.description: Multishot also fires 3 grenades which deal 120 (+4% per level) damage. Each enemy Hero hit by a grenade reduces the cooldown of Multishot by 2 seconds.

talents.name: DemonHunterMasteryMonsterHunterHungeringArrow
talents.title: Monster Hunter
talents.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 40 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 150%.

talents.name: DemonHunterMasteryFrostShot
talents.title: Frost Shot
talents.description: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: DemonHunterGloom
talents.title: Gloom
talents.description: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds. Passive: Permanently gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.

talents.name: DemonHunterSeethingHatred
talents.title: Seething Hatred
talents.description: Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred and the time it takes before Hatred expires is increased by 2 seconds.

talents.name: DemonHunterCombatStyleRancor
talents.title: Rancor
talents.description: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.

talents.name: DemonHunterMasteryDeathSiphon
talents.title: Death Siphon
talents.description: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage you deal with Strafe is returned as Health.

talents.name: DemonHunterMasteryStormofVengeance
talents.title: Storm of Vengeance
talents.description: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Lion's Fang
abilities.description: Create a shockwave that travels in a straight line, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and slowing enemies by 35% for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Parry
abilities.description: Parry all incoming Basic Attacks for 1.25 seconds, reducing their damage by 100%.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Charge
abilities.description: Charge to the target enemy, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage and slowing them by 75% for 1 second.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Taunt
abilities.description: Force the target Hero to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds. Passive: Maximum Health increased by 30%. Passive: Gain 15 Armor.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Colossus Smash
abilities.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and making them Vulnerable for 3 seconds.  Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health reduced by 10%.

abilities.name: R3
abilities.title: Twin Blades of Fury
abilities.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds. Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Heroic Strike
abilities.description: Every 18 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack deals 140 (+3.5% per level) bonus damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

talents.description: Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks. Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns. Quest: Gather 20 Regeneration Globes. Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 45 Base Attack Damage.

talents.name: VarianParryShieldWall

talents.description: Parry now grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage for the duration.

talents.name: VarianParryLivebytheSword
talents.title: Live by the Sword
talents.description: Increase the duration of Parry by 40%. If you block at least 4 Hero Basic Attacks with a single Parry, its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

talents.name: VarianColossusSmash
talents.title: Colossus Smash
talents.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 25 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 25% increased damage. Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health reduced by 10%.

talents.name: VarianMortalStrike
talents.title: Mortal Strike
talents.description: Heroes hit by Heroic Strike receive 40% reduced healing for 4 seconds.

talents.name: VarianBannerOfIronforge
talents.title: Banner of Ironforge
talents.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20 Armor to nearby allied Heroes, reducing damage taken by 20%. Lasts 12 seconds.

talents.name: VarianBannersGloryToTheAlliance
talents.title: Glory to the Alliance
talents.description: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by 50%, and the cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

talents.name: VarianParryOverpower
talents.title: Overpower
talents.description: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 20% more damage.

talents.name: VarianSecondWind
talents.title: Second Wind
talents.description: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1.17% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.

talents.name: VarianTwinBladesOfFury
talents.title: Twin Blades of Fury
talents.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds. Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

talents.name: VarianTaunt
talents.title: Taunt
talents.description: Force the target Hero to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds. Passive: Maximum Health increased by 30%. Passive: Gain 15 Armor.

talents.name: VarianDemoralizingShout
talents.title: Demoralizing Shout
talents.description: Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by 25% for 5 seconds.

talents.name: VarianChargeJuggernaut
talents.title: Juggernaut
talents.description: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 4% of their maximum Health.

talents.name: VarianLionsFangLionsMawQuest

talents.description: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 4, up to 120. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, the slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.

talents.name: VarianChargeWarbringer

talents.description: Reduces Charge's cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost by 50%.

talents.name: VarianShatteringThrow
talents.title: Shattering Throw
talents.description: Activate to throw a sword at a target Hero that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage, and up to 1400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to their Shields. Passive: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal up to 200% bonus damage to Shields.

talents.name: VarianBannerOfDalaran
talents.title: Banner of Dalaran
talents.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20% increased Ability Power to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

talents.name: VarianTwinBladesOfFuryFrenzy
talents.title: Frenzy
talents.description: Twin Blades of Fury increases Varian's Attack Speed by an additional 15%, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional 10%.

talents.name: VarianBannerOfStormwind
talents.title: Banner of Stormwind
talents.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 25% increased Movement Speed to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

talents.name: VarianColossusSmashMasterAtArms
talents.title: Master at Arms
talents.description: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

talents.name: VarianTauntVigilance
talents.title: Vigilance
talents.description: Being hit by a Hero Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Taunt by 1 seconds.

talents.name: VarianVictoryRush
talents.title: Victory Rush
talents.description: Every 60 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 400 (+4% per level) Health. When a nearby enemy minion dies, the cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Spectral Scythe

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Cursed Strikes
abilities.description: Xul's Basic Attacks deal damage in a wide area and reduce the Attack Speed of Heroes and Summons by 40% for 2 seconds. Lasts 4 seconds once triggered.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Bone Prison
abilities.description: After a 2 second delay, deal 80 (+4% per level) damage and Root the target enemy Hero for 1.75 seconds.  All nearby Skeletal Warriors will fixate on the target for their duration.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Skeletal Mages
abilities.description: Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 (+4% per level) damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Poison Nova
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 570 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

abilities.name: D1

abilities.description: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, it becomes a Skeletal Warrior with 240 (+4% per level) Health that attacks for 23 (+4% per level) damage and last up to 15 seconds. Up to 4 Skeletal Warriors can be active at once.

abilities.title: Bone Armor
abilities.description: Activate to gain a Shield equal to 25% of your maximum Health for 3 seconds.

talents.name: NecromancerTalentBoneArmorShackler

talents.description: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are Slowed by 35% for 1 second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by 2 seconds.

talents.title: Jailors
talents.description: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum.  Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors. Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 50% Movement and Attack Speed.

talents.name: NecromancerTalentTragOulsEssence
talents.title: Trag'Oul's Essence
talents.description: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.5% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.5% of his maximum Mana.

talents.name: NecromancerHeroicAbilitySkeletalMages
talents.title: Skeletal Mages
talents.description: Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 (+4% per level) damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

talents.name: HeroGenericExecutionerPassive
talents.title: Executioner
talents.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: NecromancerTalentBoneSpear
talents.title: Bone Spear
talents.description: Deal 230 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.

talents.name: NecromancerTalentBoneArmorBacklash
talents.title: Backlash
talents.description: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health.

talents.name: NecromancerTalentHarvestVitality
talents.title: Harvest Vitality
talents.description: Cursed Strikes heals for 60% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

talents.name: NecromancerHeroicAbilityPoisonNova
talents.title: Poison Nova
talents.description: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 570 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

talents.name: NecromancerTalentRapidHarvest
talents.title: Rapid Harvest
talents.description: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 10 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%.

talents.name: NecromancerTalentCorpseExplosion
talents.title: Corpse Explosion
talents.description: When Skeletal Warriors die they explode for 55 (+4% per level) damage in a small area. Deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.

talents.name: NecromancerTalentAndarielsVisage
talents.title: Andariel's Visage
talents.description: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt. Passive: Skeletal Warriors deal 50% increased damage.

talents.name: NecromancerTalentBoneArmorShade
talents.title: Shade
talents.description: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 20 seconds.

talents.name: NecromancerTalentKalansEdict
talents.title: Kalan's Edict
talents.description: Skeletal Warrior attacks reduce the cooldown of Xul's Heroic Ability by 1%.

talents.name: NecromancerTalentAmplifyDamage
talents.title: Amplify Damage
talents.description: Enemies Rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 1.75 seconds.

talents.name: NecromancerTalentGrimScythe
talents.title: Grim Scythe
talents.description: Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds, up to 12 seconds.

talents.name: NecromancerTalentWeaken
talents.title: Weaken
talents.description: Increase the Attack Speed reduction of Cursed Strikes by 35% and the duration by 1 second.

talents.name: NecromancerTalentColdHandOfDeath
talents.title: Cold Hand of Death
talents.description: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by 20%. Passive: Skeletal Warrior attacks Slow enemies by 30% for 2 seconds.

talents.name: NecromancerTalentEchoesOfDeath
talents.title: Echoes of Death
talents.description: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 60% damage.

talents.name: NecromancerTalentReapersToll
talents.title: Reaper's Toll
talents.description: Quest: Hit 20 Heroes with Spectral Scythe. Reward: Reduce the cooldown of Spectral Scythe by 3 seconds.

talents.name: NecromancerTalentMortalWound
talents.title: Mortal Wound
talents.description: Enemies hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Baneling Barrage
abilities.description: Launch 1 Baneling that deals 86 (+4% per level) splash damage.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Hunter Killer
abilities.description: Summon a Hydralisk to attack a single target, dealing 65 (+3.5% per level) damage per second. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: E1

abilities.description: Bombard target area with a Zerg Drop Pod for 147 (+3% per level) damage.   The pod spawns 2 Roachlings that deal 29 (+3% per level) damage per second and last for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: R1
