abilities.description: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 9.75% Health and Mana per second. Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 10 Nydus Worms at a time. Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.  Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.75 seconds.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Devouring Maw
abilities.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 80 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

talents.name: GenericTalentFuryoftheStorm
talents.title: Fury of the Storm

talents.name: ZagaraMasteryVolatileAcid
talents.title: Volatile Acid
talents.description: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding and their damage to non-Heroes is increased by 50%.

talents.name: ZagaraCombatStyleMedusaBlades
talents.title: Medusa Blades

talents.name: ZagaraMasteryBanelingMassacre
talents.title: Baneling Massacre

talents.name: ZagaraHeroicAbilityNydusAssault
talents.title: Nydus Network
talents.description: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 9.75% Health and Mana per second. Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 10 Nydus Worms at a time. Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.  Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.75 seconds.

talents.name: GenericTalentSpellShield

talents.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

talents.name: ZagaraMasteryMutalisk

talents.name: ZagaraMasteryEndlessCreep
talents.title: Endless Creep

talents.name: ZagaraHeroicAbilityDevouringMaw

talents.name: ZagaraMasteryHydraliskTransfusion

talents.name: ZagaraMasteryTyrantMaw

talents.name: ZagaraMasterySerratedSpines

talents.name: ZagaraMasteryProtectiveCoating

talents.name: ZagaraMasteryCorrosiveSaliva
talents.title: Corrosive Saliva
talents.description: When used against Heroes, Hunter Killers deal additional damage equal to 2% of their maximum Health.

talents.name: ZagaraMasteryCorpseFeeders
talents.title: Corpse Feeders
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by 3 seconds and Roachlings take 40% less damage from non-Heroic sources.

talents.name: ZagaraMasteryBileDrop
talents.title: Bile Drop
talents.description: Quest: Passively increases the damage of Infested Drop by 50%. Each Hero hit by the impact damage of Infested Drop increases this bonus by 5%. Reward: Upon reaching 150% bonus damage, increase the impact radius of Infested Drop by 20%.

talents.name: ZagaraMasteryEnvenomedSpines
talents.title: Envenomed Spines
talents.description: Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 230 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.

talents.name: ZagaraViscousAcid
talents.title: Viscous Acid
talents.description: Banelings slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: ZagaraMasteryBroodExpansion
talents.title: Brood Expansion
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Particle Grenade
abilities.description: Launch a particle grenade that deals 71 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the area. Deals 50% damage to Structures.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Personal Barrier
abilities.description: Gain a shield that absorbs 560 (+4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Shield Ally
abilities.description: Grants an allied Hero a shield that absorbs 420 (+4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Expulsion Zone
abilities.description: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 (+4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Graviton Surge
abilities.description: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Energy
abilities.description: Each time Zarya's Personal Barrier or Shield Ally absorbs 10 damage, her Energy is increased by 1. Each point of Energy increases Zarya's damage by 2%. After 0.5 seconds, Energy decays by 2.5 per second.

talents.name: ZaryaShieldAllyTogetherWeAreStrong
talents.title: Together We Are Strong
talents.description: Every 6 damage done by allies while under Shield Ally contributes 1 Energy, up to 30 Energy per shield.

talents.name: ZaryaShieldAllyGiveMeTwentyQuest
talents.title: Give Me Twenty
talents.description: Quest: Regeneration Globes increase Shield Ally absorb amount by 15, up to 300 permanently.  Reward: After collecting 20 Regen Globes, permanently reduce the cooldown of Shield Ally by 2 seconds.

talents.name: ZaryaPersonalBarrierExplosiveBarrier
talents.title: Explosive Barrier
talents.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier explodes, dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

talents.name: ZaryaHeroicAbilityGravitonSurge
talents.title: Graviton Surge
talents.description: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: ZaryaPersonalBarrierSpellBarrier
talents.title: Spell Barrier
talents.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier grants Zarya 75 Spell Armor for 3 Seconds, reducing the damage taken from Abilities by 75%.

talents.name: ZaryaShieldAllyGainTrain
talents.title: Gain Train
talents.description: Shield Ally now grants an untalented shield to a nearby ally upon impact.

talents.name: ZaryaEnergyHitMe
talents.title: Hit Me
talents.description: Damage absorbed by Zarya's Shields contributes 15% more Energy.

talents.name: ZaryaEnergyEnduranceTraining
talents.title: Endurance Training
talents.description: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya gains 20 Armor, reducing all damage taken by 20%.

talents.name: ZaryaWeaponFeelTheHeat
talents.title: Feel the Heat
talents.description: Zarya's Basic Attack deals 50% additional damage to enemies in melee range.

talents.name: ZaryaShieldAllySpeedBarrier
talents.title: Speed Barrier
talents.description: Shield Ally increases the allied Hero's Movement Speed by 50% for the duration.

talents.name: ZaryaPersonalBarrierUnstoppableCompetitor
talents.title: Unstoppable Competitor
talents.description: Personal Barrier makes you Unstoppable for up to 2 seconds.

talents.name: ZaryaShieldAllyCleansingShield
talents.title: Cleansing Shield
talents.description: Causes Shield Ally to remove all disabling effects and reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

talents.name: ZaryaGravitonSurgeGravityKills
talents.title: Gravity Kills
talents.description: Increases Graviton Surge's duration by 1 second and causes it to deal 175 damage over the duration.

talents.name: ZaryaParticleGrenadePinpointAccuracy
talents.title: Pinpoint Accuracy
talents.description: Particle Grenade deals 40% more damage to enemies hit by the center of the blast.

talents.name: ZaryaEnergyMaximumChargeQuest
talents.title: Maximum Charge
talents.description: Regen Globes now instantly grant 20 Energy.  Quest: Spend 150 seconds at or above 50 Energy.  Reward: Gain an additional 20 maximum Energy.

talents.name: ZaryaEnergyBornInBattle
talents.title: Born in Battle
talents.description: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya's cooldowns regenerate 25% faster.

talents.name: ZaryaUnyieldingDefender
talents.title: Unyielding Defender
talents.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Personal Barrier and Shield Ally.

talents.name: ZaryaParticleGrenadeDemolitionsExpertQuest
talents.title: Demolitions Expert
talents.description: Quest: For every 5 enemy Heroes hit by Particle Grenade, its recharge rate lowers by 0.4375 seconds, up to 3.5 seconds. Reward: Once Particle Grenade has hit 40 enemy Heroes, its radius is increased by 15%.

talents.name: ZaryaHeroicAbilityExpulsionZone
talents.title: Expulsion Zone
talents.description: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 (+4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

talents.name: ZaryaPainIsTemporary
talents.title: Pain is Temporary
talents.description: Activate to consume all Energy and gain a shield that absorbs 0.5% of Zarya's maximum Health per Energy consumed and lasts for 3 seconds. Zarya may only have one personal shield active on herself at a time.

talents.name: ZaryaPersonalBarrierIAmTheStrongest
talents.title: I Am the Strongest
talents.description: Personal Barrier absorbs an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage.

talents.name: ZaryaWeaponToTheLimit
talents.title: To the Limit
talents.description: While above 50 Energy your Basic Attack size is increased by 35%.

talents.name: ZaryaParticleGrenadePlasmaShock
talents.title: Plasma Shock
talents.description: Particle Grenade slows Movement Speed by 35% for 2 seconds to enemies near the center.

talents.name: ZaryaParticleGrenadeGrenadier
talents.title: Grenadier
talents.description: All Particle Grenade charges are returned at once.

talents.name: ZaryaDefensiveShielding
talents.title: Defensive Shielding
talents.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier and Shield Ally grant 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 6 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

talents.name: ZaryaExpulsionZoneClearOut
talents.title: Clear Out
talents.description: Increases Expulsion Zone's radius by 15% and Zarya's maximum Energy temporarily increases by 15 per enemy Hero hit for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Cleave
abilities.description: Deal 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Singularity Spike
abilities.description: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals 228 (+4% per level) damage after 1 second and slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Blink
abilities.description: Teleport to the target location.   Using this Ability does not break cloak.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Shadow Assault
abilities.description: Your Basic Attacks cause you to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Void Prison
abilities.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, making allies and enemies invulnerable and unable to act for 5 seconds. You are not affected.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Permanent Cloak
abilities.description: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds.  Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or channeling reveals you.

talents.name: GenericTalentSpellShield
talents.title: Spell Shield
talents.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

talents.name: ZeratulMasteryGreaterCleaveCleave
talents.title: Greater Cleave
talents.description: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%.

talents.name: ZeratulRendingCleave
talents.title: Rending Cleave
talents.description: Cleave deals an additional 40% damage over 3 seconds.

talents.name: ZeratulSlipintoShadow
talents.title: Slip into Shadow
talents.description: Blink gains an additional charge, but its cooldown is increased by 8 seconds.

talents.name: ZeratulHeroicAbilityVoidPrison
talents.title: Void Prison
talents.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, making allies and enemies invulnerable and unable to act for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

talents.name: ZeratulShroudofAdun
talents.title: Shroud of Adun
talents.description: Zeratul gains a shield equal to 15% of his Maximum Health over 5 seconds while under Permanent Cloak.

talents.name: ZeratulSentencedtoDeath
talents.title: Sentenced to Death
talents.description: Deal 40% increased damage to enemies while they have a Singularity Spike attached to them.

talents.name: GenericTalentRewind
talents.title: Rewind
talents.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

talents.name: GenericTalentNexusBlades
talents.title: Nexus Blades
talents.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

talents.name: ZeratulVorpalBlade
talents.title: Vorpal Blade
talents.description: Activate to teleport to the last non-structure target attacked within 3 seconds. The target is revealed during these 3 seconds.

talents.name: ZeratulGrimTask
talents.title: Grim Task
talents.description: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Ability Power by 5%, up to 50%. This bonus Ability Power is lost on death.

talents.name: ZeratulSeekerintheDark
talents.title: Seeker in the Dark
talents.description: Singularity Spike takes 50% longer to explode. It can be reactivated to teleport to the target, granting 30% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds.

talents.name: ZeratulComboSlash
talents.title: Combo Slash
talents.description: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

talents.name: ZeratulWormhole
talents.title: Wormhole
talents.description: For 2.125 seconds, reactivate Blink to return to the point where it was cast from.

talents.name: ZeratulHeroicAbilityShadowAssault
talents.title: Shadow Assault
talents.description: Basic Attacks cause Zeratul to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 4 seconds.

talents.name: ZeratulMendingStrikes
talents.title: Mending Strikes
talents.description: Basic Attacks heal for 35% of the damage dealt.

talents.name: ZeratulMasterWarpBlade
talents.title: Master Warp-Blade
talents.description: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 125% bonus damage.

talents.name: ZeratulNerazimFury
talents.title: Nerazim Fury
talents.description: Shadow Assault grants 30% Life Steal, and the duration is increased by 50%.

talents.name: ZeratulShadowHunter
talents.title: Shadow Hunter
talents.description: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to lower the Mana cost of Blink by 2.  Reward: Upon gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Blink by 1 second.

talents.name: ZeratulVoidSlash
talents.title: Void Slash
talents.description: If Cleave hits more than one enemy Hero, it deals 50% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

talents.name: ZeratulGiftoftheXelNaga
talents.title: Gift of the Xel'naga
talents.description: Allies are no longer affected by Void Prison, and enemies are slowed by 50% for 3 seconds once Void Prison ends.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Grievous Throw
abilities.description: Zul'jin throws an axe forward, dealing 125 (+4% per level) damage to the first 2 enemies hit and marking them for 8 seconds. Marked enemies take 50% bonus damage from Zul'jin's next 3 Basic Attacks against them.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Twin Cleave
abilities.description: Throw 2 axes in a large, circular arc, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage and slowing affected enemies by 15% per axe for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Regeneration
abilities.description: Zul'jin channels to regenerate 25% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. Moving while channeling or taking damage will interrupt this effect.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Taz'dingo!
abilities.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Guillotine
abilities.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 350 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Berserker
abilities.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 25% but consume 2% maximum Health per attack.  Passive: Zul'jin attacks 1% faster for every 1% of maximum Health missing.

talents.name: ZuljinYouWantAxe
talents.title: You Want Axe?
talents.description: Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes increases Zul'jin's Basic Attack damage by 1.25. Reward: After attacking Heroes 120 times, his Attack Range is increased by 1.1.

talents.name: ZuljinLetTheKillingBegin
talents.title: Let the Killing Begin
talents.description: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 6%, up to 30%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration. Hero Takedowns instantly grant 30% Attack Speed.

talents.name: ZuljinRecklessness
talents.title: Recklessness
talents.description: While Zul'jin is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 25%.

talents.name: ZuljinTazdingo
talents.title: Taz'dingo!
talents.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

talents.name: ZuljinEyeOfZuljin
talents.title: Eye of Zul'jin
talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Grievous Throw increases Zul'jin's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

talents.name: ZuljinForestMedicine
talents.title: Forest Medicine
talents.description: Regeneration no longer has to be channeled, allowing Zul'jin to perform other actions while Regenerating. However, taking damage will still end the effect.

talents.name: ZuljinTrollsBlood
talents.title: Troll's Blood
talents.description: Regeneration heal amount increased by 75%

talents.name: ZuljinFerocity
talents.title: Ferocity
talents.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 35%.

talents.name: ZuljinEnsnare
talents.title: Ensnare
talents.description: Throw a net forward, rooting the first enemy hit for 3 seconds.

talents.name: ZuljinViciousAssault
talents.title: Vicious Assault
talents.description: Increases the number of bonus damage Basic Attack hits from Grievous Throw to 6. Basic Attacks against afflicted Heroes reduces the Cooldown of Grievous Throw by 2 seconds.

talents.name: ZuljinSwirlingDeath
talents.title: Swirling Death
talents.description: Twin Cleave's Axes cycle twice and can hit enemies on each revolution, but its cooldown is increased by 4 seconds.

talents.name: ZuljinAmaniResilience
talents.title: Amani Resilience
talents.description: When Taz'dingo ends, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.

talents.name: ZuljinGuillotine
talents.title: Guillotine
talents.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 350 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

talents.name: ZuljinBuzzsaw
talents.title: Buzzsaw
talents.description: After impact, the Guillotine continues forward, dealing 50% of Guillotine's damage to enemies in the line.

talents.name: ZuljinBoneslicer
talents.title: Boneslicer
talents.description: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies, and the bonus damage is increased by 30%.

talents.name: ZuljinArcaniteAxes
talents.title: Arcanite Axes
talents.description: Lower the cooldown of Twin Cleave by 0.75 seconds for every Hero hit.  Passive: While below 50% Health, Ability Power is increased by 25%.

talents.name: ZuljinHeadhunter
talents.title: Headhunter
talents.description: Quest: Get a takedown on all unique enemy Heroes. Reward: Activate to reveal all enemy Heroes for 4 seconds.

talents.name: ZuljinWrongPlaceWrongTime
talents.title: Wrong Place Wrong Time
talents.description: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave Axes at the same time, they take 150 (+4% per level) bonus damage.

talents.name: ZuljinVoodooShuffle
talents.title: Voodoo Shuffle
talents.description: Activate to remove all current Root and Slow effects on Zul'jin.

talents.name: ZuljinLacerate
talents.title: Lacerate
talents.description: Increases the slow amount of each Twin Cleave Axe by an additional 15%.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Death and Decay
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, launch an orb that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. The explosion leaves behind a pool of decay that lasts 2 seconds, dealing 70 (+2.5% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Frost Nova
abilities.description: Create a nova that explodes after 1 second, dealing 212 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies inside and Slowing them by 35% for 2.5 seconds. Enemies in the center are Rooted for 1 second.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Chains of Kel'Thuzad
abilities.description: Launch a chain, dealing 97 (+2.5% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero or Structure hit. For 4 seconds after hitting an enemy, Chains can be reactivated to launch to an additional enemy, pulling both enemies together and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Frost Blast
abilities.description: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 100 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Shadow Fissure
abilities.description: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 400 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Master of the Cold Dark
abilities.description: Quest: Gain 1 Blight every time a Hero is Rooted by Frost Nova or hit by Chains of Kel'Thuzad. Reward: After gaining 15 Blight, the cooldown of all Basic Abilities is reduced by 2 seconds. Reward: After gaining 30 Blight, gain 75% Spell Power.

talents.name: KelThuzadThePlaguelands
talents.title: The Plaguelands
talents.description: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.

talents.name: KelThuzadBlightedFrost
talents.title: Blighted Frost
talents.description: Frost Nova deals 50% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.5 seconds.

talents.name: KelThuzadBarbedChains
talents.title: Barbed Chains
talents.description: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 15 for 4 seconds.

talents.name: KelThuzadStripShields
talents.title: Strip Shields
talents.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 112 (+4% per level) Shield, stacking up to 2 times.  Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 270 (+2.5% per level) bonus damage to Shields.

talents.name: KelThuzadPhylactery
talents.title: Phylactery of Kel'Thuzad
talents.description: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery. Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again. Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.

talents.name: KelThuzadArchlichArmor
talents.title: Armor of the Archlich
talents.description: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 45 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.

talents.name: KelThuzadAcceleratedDecay
talents.title: Accelerated Decay
talents.description: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 25% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 6 times.

talents.name: KelThuzadGlacialSpike
talents.title: Glacial Spike
talents.description: Activate to create a spike that detonates after 4 seconds, dealing 60 (+2.5% per level) damage to nearby enemies. The spike can be affected by Chains of Kel'Thuzad.

talents.name: KelThuzadChillingTouch
talents.title: Chilling Touch
talents.description: Every 8 seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits nearby enemies, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by 30% for 2 seconds.

talents.name: KelThuzadFrozenTomb
talents.title: Frost Blast
talents.description: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 100 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: KelThuzadShadowFissure
talents.title: Shadow Fissure
talents.description: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 400 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area.

talents.name: KelThuzadIcyGrasp
talents.title: Icy Grasp
talents.description: Increase Frost Nova's Slow duration by 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: KelThuzadChainsOfIce
talents.title: Chains of Ice
talents.description: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by 60% for 1 second.

talents.name: KelThuzadChainLink
talents.title: Chain-Link
talents.description: Pulling two Heroes together with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 4 seconds.

talents.name: KelThuzadArcaneEchoes
talents.title: Arcane Echoes
talents.description: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.

talents.name: KelThuzadHungeringCold
talents.title: Hungering Cold
talents.description: Enemies Rooted by Frost Nova take an additional 55 (+2.5% per level) damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad during the next 4 seconds.

talents.name: KelThuzadPowerOfIcecrown
talents.title: Power of Icecrown
talents.description: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

talents.name: KelThuzadDeathchill
talents.title: Deathchill
talents.description: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.

talents.name: KelThuzadMightOfTheScourge
talents.title: Might of the Scourge
talents.description: Hitting a Hero with Shadow Fissure resets it cooldown.

talents.name: KelThuzadShiftingMalice
talents.title: Shifting Malice
talents.description: Activate to dash forward, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.

talents.name: KelThuzadTheDamnedReturn
talents.title: The Damned Return
talents.description: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts 15 seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay.

abilities.name: Q1
abilities.title: Healing Dart
abilities.description: Fire a dart which heals the first allied Hero hit for 250 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: W1
abilities.title: Biotic Grenade
abilities.description: Toss a Grenade at the target area. Allied Heroes hit are are healed for 175 (+4% per level) Health and receive 25% increased healing for 4 seconds. Enemies hit take 60 (+4% per level) damage and receive 100% less healing for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: E1
abilities.title: Sleep Dart
abilities.description: Fire a dart that puts the first enemy Hero hit to Sleep, rendering them unable to act for 3 seconds. Sleep's effects end instantly if the target takes damage after the first 0.5 seconds. Cannot be used on Vehicles.

abilities.name: R1
abilities.title: Eye of Horus
abilities.description: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 8 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds hit the first allied or enemy Hero or enemy Structure in their path. Allies are healed for 300 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 175 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

abilities.name: R2
abilities.title: Nano Boost
abilities.description: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 0 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster. Cannot be used on Ana.

abilities.name: D1
abilities.title: Shrike
abilities.description: Basic Attacks apply a Dose to non-Structure enemies, dealing an additional 44 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds, and stacking up to 5 times.

talents.name: AnaBioticGrenadeGrenadeCalibration
talents.title: Grenade Calibration
talents.description: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Biotic Grenade. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Biotic Grenade does 75% more damage per allied and enemy Hero hit. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Biotic Grenade's duration on allies is increased from 4 seconds to 12 seconds, and its healing radius is increased by 100%.

talents.name: AnaPiercingDarts
talents.title: Piercing Darts
talents.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Sleep Dart. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Sleep Dart now hits 2 Heroes and its range is increased by 50%. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Healing Dart now hits 2 Heroes and its range is increased by 50%.

talents.name: AnaDetachableBoxMagazine
talents.title: Detachable Box Magazine
talents.description: Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero. Reward: After reaching maximum Dosage 5 times, Doses deal 50% increase damage to enemies with 5 Doses. Reward: After reaching maximum Dosage 15 times, unlock the Active Reload Ability, which can be activated to instantly gain 3 charges of Healing Dart.

talents.name: AnaBioticGrenadeAirStrike
talents.title: Air Strike
talents.description: Activate to use Biotic Grenade with a 200% increased range, but Grenades thrown this way take 4 seconds to land. Passive: Reduce Biotic Grenade cooldown by 4 seconds.

talents.name: AnaOverdose
talents.title: Overdose
talents.description: Hitting enemies with Sleep Dart and Biotic Grenade applies 2 Doses.

talents.name: AnaAimDownSights
talents.title: Aim Down Sights
talents.description: Shrike can be activated to increase vision radius by 100% and Basic Attack range by 2 but reduce Movement Speed by 20%. Lasts until canceled.

talents.name: AnaSleepingDartTemporaryBlindness
talents.title: Temporary Blindness
talents.description: After Sleep Dart's effects wear off, targets are Blinded for 2 seconds.

talents.name: AnaMindNumbingAgent
talents.title: Mind-Numbing Agent
talents.description: Every Dose a Hero has reduces their Spell Power by 15%.

talents.name: AnaDebilitatingDart
talents.title: Debilitating Dart
talents.description: Activate to fire a dart which reduces the damage dealt by the first enemy Hero it hits by 50% for 4 seconds.

talents.name: AnaHeroicAbilityNanaBoost
talents.title: Nano Boost
talents.description: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 0 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster. Cannot be used on Ana.

talents.name: AnaHeroicAbilityEyeOfHorus
talents.title: Eye of Horus
talents.description: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 8 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds hit the first allied or enemy Hero or enemy Structure in their path. Allies are healed for 300 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 175 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

talents.name: AnaHealingDartSpeedSerum
talents.title: Speed Serum
talents.description: Healing Dart grants 25% Movement Speed to affected Heroes for 2 seconds.

talents.name: AnaHealingDartPurifyingDarts
talents.title: Purifying Darts
talents.description: Healing Dart removes Roots and Slows from the target, and heals for 20% more when doing so.

talents.name: AnaHealingDartSmellingSalts
talents.title: Smelling Salts
talents.description: Healing Dart removes Stuns from the target, and grants them 50 Armor for 2 seconds when doing so.

talents.name: AnaHealingDartSharpshooter
talents.title: Sharpshooter
talents.description: Healing Dart's healing is increased by 5% each time it heals a Hero, up to 50%. This bonus is reset if Healing Dart fails to hit a Hero.

talents.name: AnaHealingDartConcentratedDoses
talents.title: Concentrated Doses
talents.description: Increase Healing Dart's healing by 10% for each Dose active on enemy Heroes.

talents.name: AnaBioticGrenadeContactHealing
talents.title: Contact Healing
talents.description: Biotic Grenade heals for 30% more per allied and enemy Hero hit.

talents.name: AnaNanoInfusion
talents.title: Nano Infusion
talents.description: Allies affected by Nano Boost heal for 50% of Spell Damage dealt.

talents.name: AnaEyeOfHorusBallisticAdvantage
talents.title: Ballistic Advantage
talents.description: Eye of Horus rounds explodes upon impact, healing nearby allies for 300 (+4% per level) and dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemy Heroes.

talents.name: AnaSomnolentDoses
talents.title: Somnolent Doses
talents.description: Upon stacking 5 Doses, Heroes are put to Sleep for 2 seconds.

talents.name: AnaDynamicShooting
talents.title: Dynamic Shooting
talents.description: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by 10% for 4 seconds, up to 100%.

talents.name: AnaAimDownSightsCustomOptics
talents.title: Custom Optics
talents.description: Increase the Aim Down Sights Basic Attack range bonus from 2 to 4.
